name: Del Chick
text: Sandy is the BEST loan officer I’ve ever met and I’m a former 30 year Realtor !   She is quick, professional, friendly but businesslike, and we’ve recommended her to everyone !  She’s fantastic !!!!

name: Dan Smoker
text: Great experience.  Used Sandy and Certainty twice in 2 years.  We saved time and money.

name: Mallorie Lee
text:
Josh Aaron is a phenomenal mortgage lender. He helped my husband and I with countless properties spanning 3 years (yes, years!) Of house hunting. I recommend Josh to every home buyer. He was so patient and knowledgeable about the different loan types and was so helpful with our hours and hours of searching. Once we finally found a house and got an offer accepted,  he was there every step of the way until closing. After closing, he sent us a very nice thank you gift and we still talk often- 1.5 years later. I will never use anyone else, and I recommend you don't either!
-Brandon and Mallorie Lee

name: Gail Shields
text: Josh did a great job getting us the loan on our first house. He was extremely easy to talk to, and always kept us informed. No question is a crazy question to him, and he takes time to explain everything in detail, so you understand what's going on. He works hard to get you a great deal, and payment you can afford. I highly recommend Josh! He makes the stress of buying a house so much easier!

name: Foley, AL 7003
text:
Josh and his team are amazing!! They handled our original purchase a few years ago and we just had the pleasure of working with them again to refinance with the interest rates dropping.
You will not find a better place for your home financing needs. They are fast honest and all around awesome!

name: Chrissy Spann
text: Josh and his team are excellent! He helped my husband and I get our first house and it was an extreme pleasure to be able to work with them. Their response time is quick and efficient, Josh was super kind every time we had a question. I would definitely recommend Josh and his team to help you get a home !!

name: Luci Crutcher
text: Josh was amazing during our home buying experience. It was our first time buying a home and josh was there to answer any questions we had about our mortgage loan and was always so quick to respond. Josh made the mortgage process so easy for us with weekly to-dos, always keeping us updated throughout the process and we are so thankful! I would DEFINITELY recommend Josh as a lender, he is the best!

name: Darlennia Payton
text: Josh is by far the best person for this job. He kept everyone involved informed at all times. He made something that can be a stressful time such an ease. I can't thank him enough for the wonderful experience.

text: Josh helped with a new mortgage and a refinance.  The process could not have been easier because Josh handled each step professionally with ease.  He knows mortgages and I am very pleased with my new rate.  I highly recommend Mortgage Josh for any of your mortgage needs.

name: Amy Bruneau
text: Josh and his team were great. Very fast and efficient. They helped us through the buying process and kept us informed about what was happening and what would take place next. I will definitely recommend Josh and his team to others who wish to purchase a home.

text: Josh did a fantastic job with the house purchase. He made it painless made sure we understood everything. If we buy or refinance a house we would use Josh

text: I am 64 years of age raising 4 grandsons. We were hit by Hurricane Sally and forced to look for another place to live. At the time we were renting and the market went crazy after the Hurricane. We will be forever grateful for the great advice she gave us and sticking with us throughout the whole process. I never dreamed we would own a home.

text:
Cissy Bacon was our lending agent and she was incredible. We have completed 5 other mortgages with other lending institutions and while the service was good, it in now way compared to the 5 star service and communication from Cissy. She communicated at a high level throughout the loan process, including making sure we were aware of other actions we might consider (not directly related to our loan) that we should look into to help us reduce our total cost related to our home.

I would definitely use Nations Lending in the future and especially with the assistance of Cissy Bacon

name: Joy Watts
text:
I set up a post-dated payment for one of my monthly installments and these Jokers, probably because it was Black Friday or probably because of human error, decided to send that payment through three days early. This caused me to end up with NSF fees for the living expenses that I have come out monthly. I called to tell him about it in a voice mail and never heard from them until I was late the following month.
They didn't even have the decency to offer an apology when they called to ask for the payment. Shameful. People who are borrowing money obviously don't need a company who doesn't care when they make things harder. Accident or not. They need a company with morals.
I will be reporting it to the better business bureau and speaking to an attorney see if this company needs to be responsible for those fees. I don't understand how, with a "recorded confirmation", they can send the electronic payments through before the day that is authorized.

resp.text: Joy, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We apologize that you had an unfavorable experience.   Please call us directly at 844-338-2080 so that we can investigate this matter further.

name: Richard Hardigree
text: We bank with bank independent in Decatur for several years now. I was in Athens with my family and had a check to deposit. My wife needed to use the restroom and was told no public restrooms. I am shocked that a bank that serves customers on a daily basis does not offer a basic service for its customers. Also very disappointed in the way we spoke too.

resp.text: We're sorry you had a negative experience at our Athens location, Richard! Because of the layout of some offices, including Athens Downtown, public restrooms are not available for security reasons. We're sorry for the inconvenience and the way you were spoken to. If there is anything we can do for you, please reach out to ma@bibank.com.

name: Jc
text: Will only notarize for members of the bank, unless your willing to pay $5.00. Bank had no customers in the building. May have made a customer had they proved they wanted business. Not willing to help the public unless money is involved.

name: Nikki Rochelle
text:
Really unhappy with my service today. I came through the drive through and the woman at the window took my money, gave me my receipt, and said "bye". I was not finished with my transaction so I pushed the call button and she said "do you need something else?".
When I told her a needed a different receipt, she said I would have to wait and she started to cash a check for a guy who pulled up to the next window AFTER I had arrived. Not only was she rude she was not helpful. After the man with the check finished his transaction. The teller came back to me and told me I should just use the app because she is alone and doesn't have any assistance in the office today (but the app is not showing the money deposited). She told me to wait a minute she just had to help this next woman with her transaction and she could assist me. This woman was the car behind the man who cashed the check (so TWO people that arrived after I did). I moved to Alabama from out of state and BB&t Bank came highly recommended to me from a lot of people that I met. I am seriously considering finding a another bank with employees who take customer service seriously, and care about maintaining customer relationships.

name: Domingo Ayala
text: Everyone at this bank is nice until Megan just gave me an awkwardly stare without any explanation and I asked “ ..... What? “ And she didn’t say anything which was beyond weird and unprofessional. I have had never experienced that type of odd behavior. Everyone else is nice and professional.

name: Jessica Penningtom
text: I love everyone at this location and they love my husky always spoil him giving him dog treats at the drive thru Everytime I come through they are all sweet never any issues or problems.

name: Selenophile Xx
text:
I opened my acct at this branch. I am currently living out of state in Wisconsin where there are no BBTs. I was very concerned about having to close my acct.. so I call this branch to see what i needed to do, some lady (yarah I believe) told me there was nothing she could do to help me.. i couldn't do it over the phone/online.. I tell her my situation. And she showed no concern or effort to help me. She told me I HAD to go to a branch in person to close my acct.. or I will still be charged a $5 maintenance fee..she also told me I would be charged a $35 fee if there's no money in the acct,on top of the$5.. needless to say when I hung up the phone I was very stressed & displeased..
I call the BBT on hwy72 in Madison AL.. I didn't need to say much of anything, the lady I spoke to was MORE than happy to help. INFACT, she told me the complete opposite from what this pelham branch told me.. that she could close it over the phone, easy! I just need to take my money out..&, she would keep an eye on my acct for me. THAT'S good customer service!

text: Emily is fantastic!

He has been amazing and a blessing to Us.

text: Tim is fast and has great rates!

name: Dusty Henagan
text: Just opened an account yesterday and so far the level of customer service has been A++++. Employees at the Taylor Road location have been super nice, especially Britney who helped me open my account. I love that they can print a debit card on site. Thanks Max!

name: Bama 03GSXR1K
text: I love Max. They always take care of my financial needs. They have the best rates I can find anywhere. They gave me loans both of my cars and soon will have my house. I cannot complain one bit. Service is always great and new business needs are always handled quickly and efficiently. I just set auto withdraw and never have to worry about late payments, which also gave me a lower rate.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I miss the days when Max Credit Union was Max Federal Credit Union. Back then you couldn't get an account unless you were military or related to someone with an account. Then they became a community credit union where anyone who lived in the tri-county could join. I guess that was good for expanding the business but they are a lot more crowded now. We've been customers for almost 30 years. They still offer very good services. Their accounts are still very reasonable and they are the first placed I'd go for a car loan.

name: Jan Rowe
text: The extended hours at the teller drive thru proved to be very convenient to me.  I usually go to the ATM. My needs were such that I needed the drive thru lanes and was grateful it was still open yesterday when I passed by on my way home.

name: Sash hsaS
text:
Visited here to do a small loan and ended up doing full auto financing here. Mrs M Crenshaw is absolutely the most helpful, sincere, organized, professional and courteous person ever. she was super patient and made sure I understood everything. The service she delivered played a vital role in me doing business with Max Credit union.

The rates were good and I highly recommend this credit union.

name: The Woof Pack
text:
I'd just like to update my review, Mike Crew has phenomenal customer service! People like him are the reason why I bank with Max and no one else! Also, I know it's silly but it feels awesome being called a member. Keep up the great work Max!

Great customer service! Convenient drive thrus.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We really appreciate your feedback Jewelia!

name: C Payson
text: I have been a member of MAX for over 40 years.  A lot has changed in banking but MAX remains focused on the customer.  They are local, focused on community and customer and provide me with financial services that meet my needs. #lovemyMAX41

name: Jessica Wheeler
text: Worst credit union EVER! So unhelpful and rude. If I had the option to finance my car with someone else at the time of purchase I definitely would have.

#lovemymax22

This is by far the worst bank I have ever seen they lied five times to us we paid to have our house appraised which they told us it appraised for $54,000 and in fact it appraised for $68,000 then after a month of dealing with them  they told us they couldn't give us an equity loan to fix our house because there was a crack in the wall and there system auto denied our loan the loan manager said she will get her boss to look at it and ask him to give us the loan that was Monday morning I ask if there was any progress Monday evening around 3 she said if a ask him about your loan he will just turn you down  bottom line don't do business with them and don't trust them. there not friendly and they don't care about us
the picture is where the 63 year old house settled why they sais they couldn't do anything

name: zachery barnes
text: Up until last week I would have given 5 stars as they have always been good to me. Then they drafted money from my account to pay a relatives loan without permission from anyone. When confronted lied saying that person authorized it when they didn't. Then refused to return the money back to my account as they said they had the legal authority to do it. Which according to realitives with extensive time in banking said it could only been done if I was on the loan which I wasn't. Finally after much back and forth between the parties involved they admitted they wasn't authorized or supposed to draft that money. To which they finally reversed the transaction but didn't reverse the entire amount. They kept 2 dollars for some reason. If you get a loan here or a relative does be prepared for some shady business practices.

P. Symister

name: Jeremy Cummings
text: They made buying home a lot easier than i thought it would or could be! They made financing easy, got our payments where we liked them and got us good interest rate! Courtney Love and Meagan Jackson where in contact with me and my wife every step of the way, from loan approval application on how much we could finance for! We found house we liked called them they met us in Ozark gave us sellers contract  same day! Took sellers contract to home owner we signed .Hometown lenders met us in Ozark next morning to get sellers contract. started our loan process told us where we was every step of the way told us our estimated closing date! Hometown lenders even helped us save money on home owners insurance with more coverage than quotes we where getting on our own! Hometown lenders worked for and helped us on everything! Thank you for everything y'all done Courtney Love and Meagan Jackson!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Wanda Eckenroth
text: This is the second time using this company Neel was invaluable to our closing on time.  He was patient even when I was losing mine.  I would highly recommend Neel and his team.  Neel was professional from start to finish and always responded to my questions even after hours.

text: Would definitely recommend!! Buying a house was SUPER EASY with their help!!! Call Courtney!! You won't regret it!!

text: Give them a shot at your target. Happy to have my new home!!

name: Dominique Bowman
text: I had a wonderful experience dealing with Neel Pathak! I recommend Hometown Lenders to anyone who needs to refinance or buy a new home!

name: Colby Easterling
text:
Had an awesome experience, I have worked with several lenders, and I have been denied by more lenders than most people apply to in a lifetime. I was fresh out of the military, with only a years work experience outside of it(some didn’t count because I was contracted prior to). I was being told that I’d have to work a few more years by every lender I spoke to. It took me 10 months of lender hopping to find home town lenders. I closed about 30 days later with a conventional loan that I was told was impossible to get by other lenders. My agent also would drop what he was doing and meet me at my work to sign the non digital items. Also their underwriters are in house, so there are less excuses for stuff not getting done, it’s not some slimy credit union **STAY AWAY FROM CREDIT UNIONS FOR LOANS** credit unions are professional time wasters, if you are batting a thousand, they will keep you on the hook then tell you that you don’t qualify.

Anyways, Home town lenders is the way to go. They have set a new standard for a lender to me. Everyone that’s complaining wanted hard money loans (less that 50k) and or if you look at their profiles, they’ve complained about every place they’ve stepped foot in. Just call, and make your own assessment!

name: Anna Long
text: Did not complete contract in a timely manner.  Little or no communication unless initiated by client.  Made excuses that they were very busy when asked for updates.  Would not contact the underwriter for an explanation on the delays prior to closing.

text: I bought my first home & Hometown Lenders exceeded all my expectations!! Amazing customer service!! From the day I put in an offer to the day we closed was just 9 business days!! I highly recommend Tim Watson to make all your home dreams come true!!

name: Karen Landay
text:
In an effort to keep this review from going on for approximately forever, I will try to distill our experience down to the essentials.  However, in short, if you value your time and sanity, DO NOT, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, GET A MORTGAGE FROM INTERLINC.

Our loan officer was Jerry Brown, referred to us by our realtor.  Jerry believes that he is an excellent communicator, which could not be further from the truth.  Additionally, he has no interest in listening to his customers -- when he interrupted me on the phone (which was a frequent occurrence) and I interrupted back to say, politely but firmly, "Jerry, do not interrupt me," he immediately HUNG UP THE PHONE on me.  He then emailed me to say that he "would not allow" me to speak to him like that and that all further business would need to be conducted via email.  This, because I spoke up to tell him that I was not finished speaking and wanted my concerns heard before he blew them off again.  There is truly no excuse for hanging up on a customer, in my book.

When the time came to transfer us to a closing officer, Jerry did not introduce us, tell us what was happening, or in any way orient us to the situation -- which, again, was typical for our experience.  Once the closing officer took over, Jerry just stopped answering emails.  At no point did we really have any idea what was going on, what was next, and where we were in the process.  To be told that "your approval is on my desk" and then asked for more documents and verification does not make sense.  Either we are approved, so we are done, or we are not, and further information is needed.  Once again, Jerry showed no interest in listening to my concern and confusion as to where we were in the process.

Issues with Jerry aside, the fact that we were doing a "mail away" closing -- since we obviously could not travel 900 miles just to sign some documents -- seemed to present a major problem for Interlinc.  We were not informed as to the timing of the process, and though everyone involved knew when we were signing the GIANT stack of documents, it was only almost a week after the closing that we were informed that, due to federal regulations, we would have to re-sign the ENTIRE PACKAGE (some 92 pages) with a new date.  Once again, communication among various Interlinc employees was atrocious, as we were essentially bounced around like a hot potato, never knowing who was supposed to be organizing things for us.

In fact, our experience was so poor that I emailed a complaint to, among others, the CEO, requesting a refund of some of the absolutely ridiculous fees (1% origination fee, plus another $1,000+ in additional garbage).  An attorney for Interlinc contacted us, investigated the situation (whatever that means), and promptly issued us a check for the amount we requested.  The fact that we received that refund tells me that they know how badly they screwed up...and yet, we then had to deal with the date issue I mentioned above, with more of the same bad communication.  Clearly, they did not actually LEARN from their mistakes with us.

So if you want to, like me, suffer physical anxiety at every email and phone call, worry about approval on a "slam dunk mortgage," and generally undergo a severe amount of stress because, for instance, you keep thinking your mortgage is DONE, and aren't you just wrong as heck, please, get a mortgage from Interlinc.  Otherwise, take my advice and stay as far away as possible from this company.

name: Chase Deppen
text: If you are a business owner and you deposit more $5525.00, they will not honor your deposit or give you access to those funds for 10 days.  Upon opening my business account, I wrote a personal check from my personal account to help fund my business account.  The next day, I called my bank to make sure that they had sent the funds to BB&T.  My bank told me that BB&T had received the funds the next business day.  However, BB&T told me that while they had the funds from my personal account, my business account wouldn't be able to access those funds for over a week.  Initially, they claimed that this happened only because it was a new account.  However, when I made a second deposit and the same thing happened-- immediate access to $200 and the rest of the deposit would maybe be available in 7-10 days-- they then pointed me to the account agreement where it said that all deposits over $5525.00 would have a holding period of 7-10 days.  I totally understand that is their policy, I just want to warn any business owner that this bank is not interested in deposits and will treat you terribly when you question the policy.

name: Christy Johnson
text: Let's face it, the mortgage and underwriting experience can be incredibly stressful, so there's much to be said for individuals who work diligently on your behalf. EVERY single step of the way, Josh Winn did a fantastic job. This was not my first home purchase, so I can say the level of attention, professionalism and sensitivity is unique to TJC Mortgage. With this group, you're not simply numbers or bank account transactions on a spreadsheet. Josh Winn & his team have set the bar - much higher in fact than I could have imagined through the process. Lenders don't have a role at the the table on closing day and with the busyness of the peak real estate season, I was floored when Josh walked through the door. He was there simply to tell me, "congratulations!"

resp.text: Thank you Christi!

name: Matt
text:
I can’t say enough good things about Joe “Bear” Meadow and his assistant, Kristi. They made what was such a frustrating process, into an extremely easy and efficient process.
I was working with another local lender for months and getting nowhere. They weren’t making any effort to make me or my home buying experience a priority and I missed out on a handful of houses that I’d loved to have put offers on because they wouldn’t get back to me with pre approval letters or actual numbers of what I qualified for. When the numbers finally did come through, I would update them with promotions at work and pay increases which somehow made my amount of money drop by $70,000. When brought to their attention, they simply told me that there was nothing they could do because I was a single father paying child support and the only option I had was to somehow workout a deal with my ex wife where I was paying her off the books and there was no record of me having to pay child support. Obviously that was nowhere close to being an option. We wasted 6 months with this company and finally decided to go another direction. Because I was using the VA loan, my realtor suggested I contact Joe Meadow and said he had a good reputation in the community for working with veterans. I thank God I did. Literally from the first phone call, he put me at ease and promised to take care of me. He followed through with that promise and within 3 days of working with him and his team, they had a pre approval letter in my hand for a much more realistic number that would allow me to get into a nice home in a good neighborhood so I could feel that my child and family will be safe and taken care of. I am sure Joe takes care of all of his customers but guys, if you are veterans who are using the VA loan, trust me and go with Joe and Kristi. They will work their tails off for you and you don’t have to worry about tracking them down or having to leave a bunch of messages begging for them to call you back. The process was so much more efficient and productive with them. This was the 4th house I’ve bought and by far the best service from a lender out of all of them. I highly suggest using Joe and he will be my lender from here on out.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-star review!

name: Fred Calalang
text: Great company!  Assisted with the purchase of my house in Georgia.  Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-star review!

name: Teresa T
text:
Horrible, awful, & dishonest company.  I implore all Realtors/Buyers/Sellers to stay far away from them & their shady business practices.  They lied to my buyer, my buyer's realtor, me, my realtor, the seller of the house I am buying, that seller's realtor, & the closing attorney.  They lied to everyone throughout the whole loan process assuring us all repeatedly that we were good to go & everything was running on time.  Then less that 24 hours prior to us sitting at the closing table the closing attorney could not get the paperwork out of them for the close & we found out that the originating loan officer, Pierre Brown, was out of the county vacationing.  So this guy goes on vacation knowing he has a loan closing scheduled & he is no where near completing the process!  Mind you even the appraisal had been in MortgageRight's possession for 14 days, the file was never even sent to underwriting.  They just let it sit.  Bottom line if you actually want to buy or sell a home, avoid this company at all costs!

Response to the owner's response:  BS!  A buyer getting disqualified is fine if you actually finish the loan process & disqualify them in a timely manner.  Instead you sat on documents while your loan officer told all parties involved we were good to go good to close up until the day before closing.  You did a horrible job & your employee lied to everyone.  You even closed your Facebook page down for 2 weeks after this fiasco to avoid all the bad reviews being posted there.  The owner of your shady company even told all of us he was thinking of disproving the borrowers application based on nothing except the fact that your company had received so many phone calls expressing displeasure over the way your shady company handled the situation.  Your company has a reputation among agents & other legit mortgage companies for being shady & you 100% lived up to your reputation.  All you tell is lies lies & more lies.

resp.text: We are always disappointed when we don’t meet the expectations of our clients, referral partners, or other parties involved in a real estate transaction. We approve borrowers based on the information they provide and work to verify that information during the mortgage process. Sometimes information becomes available during the process that leads us to disqualify a purchasers eligibility for a new mortgage. We recognize that timely communication is important. Unfortunately, we cannot always predict late changes to a borrowers income or credit.

name: Jeff Williams
text: —Joe Bear & his staff were excellent to work with. We Had to find a house & close before our little girl was due & they helped to make it possible. Thank you & highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Jeff! Glad Joe Bear was able to help you. Congratulations on the new home and the new addition!

name: Joey Mure
text: Josh Winn and the team at TJC Mortgage really know how to help you buy or refinance real estate.  This company is full service and Josh does an amazing job of listening to your needs and giving professional guidance all along the way.  I highly recommend him!

resp.text: Thank you Joey!

name: Rachel Harbor
text: I had a great experience with TJC mortgage. Carla and Libby were a pleasure to work with. The whole process was very good. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Rachel!

name: Deven Arnold
text: I was working with Pierre Brown trying to get an FHA construction to permanent loan. This company lies on their website about offering FHA construction to permanet loans. Pierre took me through the whole process of getting approved only to find out I would have to put 20% down to even start building the house. I called him back asking for an explanation and he said he was going to look into it. I haven't heard a word from him since then. I wouldn't recommend this company to anyone. If you want proof of email trail let me know.

text: My realtor referred me to Josh Winn at TJC and he talked to me for a long time as we figured out how to get our family of four into our forvever home. We didn't have the perfect financial situation, but he worked with me to figure it out and make it work. We were able to get a conventional loan with a great interest rate and close in less than 30 days. I would recommend Josh to everyone I know. It was like having a friend in the mortgage business!

text: Joshua was able to get our refinance squared away fairly quickly and efficiently. During our closing Joe came in and spoke with us. Overall great experience. I would highly recommend to anyone considering.

name: Laura Gardner
text: Excellent customer service! Josh Winn is easy to work with and is quick to respond to any questions you may have. I highly recommend!

name: Hileri Gurtis
text:
Poor Business Practice. Potentially unethical
We have our house on the market. We received an offer from buyers who were given a loan pre-approval letter from TJC Mortgage stating that they were approved for USDA loan. This letter accompanied the contract that we then signed after agreeing on the price of our home. We then found a home ourselves - drew up a contract and made an offer to another seller who accepted our offer. We then find out that our buyers financing fell through.  Our Buyer was told by their lender that they now do not qualify for the USDA loan. This TJC Mortgage Company wrote a letter of pre-approval before they even ran the couple's credit - wasting all of our time and almost costing myself and my husband 1000's of dollars. How does a company get away with writing up approvals of credit prior to actually doing their job and checking one's credit background to actually see if they qualify? Of course this shortsighted behavior has inconvenienced the buyers, their agent, my family, our agent, our lender, and the sellers we were going to buy from and their agents as well. All because TJC Mortgage - did not do their due diligence and check the credit of a couple prior to writing up their approval. There should be a law against that.

name: Margaret Barron
text: We worked with Josh Winn to purchase a foreclosure. Josh was there every step of the way. He was very available. Even when I thought my late calls would go to voicemail, he would pick up and patiently answer all my questions. Josh also made sure that we closed earlier than the seller's deadline.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-star review!

name: Kenneth Davis
text:
Joe is an excellent guy who really cares.  6 months ago he gave me free credit advice.  He really went out of his way to help me when he didn't have to.  He helped raise my score 147 points.  All of that while he was at home with his family.

That really means a lot.  While shopping for a Loan i found out they beat everyone as well.  What else can you ask for in a company.

name: Keith Stahlhut
text: Great folks to with with, very efficient process.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Keith!

name: Christian Vaughn
text: Great Service

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-star review!

name: Nathan Hangen
text: Joe and Ken strung us along for almost 6 months, rarely offering updates or responding to our request for status updates. Lots of spin and excuses. They also stuck me with multiple fees that they promised to take care of. I would stay far away from these guys.

resp.text:
Nathan,

We are always disappointed to learn that we did not meet or exceed a client’s expectations.  As you stated in your review, we were unable to provide financing on the terms requested after a great deal time and effort on our end.  While we cannot always control underwriting guidelines or underwriter decisions, we do control client communication and apologize if we did not meet your standard in this regard.

As for the fees you mention paying in your post, TJC does not charge any upfront or out of pocket fees, therefore please contact our corporate office (205-815-9200) to discuss any you have paid.  If you are referencing the invoice you received from the home appraiser, please know that we have issued a check to cover this fee on your behalf.

Good luck to you and your family, we appreciate your service to our country.

Tanner Allen

name: Tessie Barrett
text: I love working with TJC and Josh Winn. They are always very professional, informative and their communication with their customers is outstanding. I highly recommend them.

name: Susan Beard
text: I inquired with Tayler at TJC Mortgage regarding a refinance after I experienced issues with my bank (whom held my mortgage for five previous years) handling the process for me. Not only was Tayler able to get the refinance completed, he and Ben worked seamlessly through the entire process, reducing my interest rate and helping me achieve my goals. They would call and/or email with updates and detailed explanations regarding each step of the process. Since I was dealing with a time-sensitive situation, this professionalism was essential for my process. I would highly recommend Tayler, Ben, and all the folks at TJC Mortgage to anyone considering a home purchase or refinance!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Susan!

name: Jason Hamer
text: Joshua Graham Winn is great! I highly recommend him and the team at TJC Mortgage.

name: Jason Biddy
text: The buyers purchasing our home are using TJC Mortgage and we were set to close last Friday November 18th.   We hired movers and were out of our house by that date.  We were told Friday the closing would be delayed until the 22nd.  Yesterday, we were told again the closing would be delayed and now we are being told December 15 at the earliest.  According to the agent, this is all due to TJC not getting the information in for the USDA loan in a timely manner.  There has also been very poor communication as to what is going on and why.  It is my understanding last week the Loan Officer was on vacation and unable to even be reached.   Had we known we would not have been closing until December 15th, we would have been able to avoid temporary housing and moving expenses.  Our new home would have been ready by then and we would have only had to move once.  This has cost my family over $4000.  I emailed all 3 of the owners last week and never even received an e-mail back explaining what happened.  I am very disappointed and would not recommend this company.

resp.text: We are sorry that you have been inconvenienced, there are many things that factor into a mortgage loan approval, we make every effort to navigate the underwriting process as quickly as possible, but complications do sometimes arise. Unfortunately, since you are not the borrower we are unable to disclose to you the details that may have caused a delay in this loan approval and due to privacy laws, we cannot comment further.

name: Allison Mathews
text: I heard about TJC Mortgage from WDJC's adline. Decided to inquire online to see if I could afford a home, and to get more information on a mortgage. Josh Winn called me back the day after I put in my online request and he spent a good amount of his time explaining everything and breaking it down for me to understand (which was exactly what I needed). Josh pre-approved me over the phone and referred me to the best-fit realtor for my needs. Josh was my right-hand man in this whole process. I was deathly afraid that buying a house was going to be a long, drawn out process—but with Josh’s help and quick assistance, I was able to find a house and close within 30 days! Josh is great! What I liked about Josh the most during this process is how he was there for me, whenever I needed him. No matter what the question or random thought that came to my mind, he was there to respond in a matter of seconds. I am forever thankful for Josh and the TJC Mortgage team.

resp.text: Thank you, Allison.  Congratulations on your new home! So happy we could assist you!  Please call on us anytime :-) TJC

name: Kelsey D
text: Worst experience. My fiancé and I were first time home buyers and after doing our research we decided to try TJC. Danielle was the person who helped us and from the bat I had an uneasy feeling. Should have walked away then. For starters, she kept getting our application information wrong. We were given a different explanation anytime we spoke to her about what numbers to expect. She would repeatedly say things like, "going to call you at 2:00" and would either a) call at 10 at night or b) not call at all. She texted everything. Which I normally would be fine with but with it being such confidential info I felt like it was super unprofessional. The day that we got our pre approval letter she kept telling me that we would not qualify for the particular one we were going for, I asked why because she had been telling us we were approved for 3 weeks. She called my fiancé by the wrong name and I corrected her in the next email and she then informed me that she had sent me the wrong information and that we were approved. She had not only gotten me confused with someone else but she had sent us someone else's information! I then knew that persons name, financial information, had their application, etc. She immediately texted me and said something along the lines of "omg like so sorry, someone else has a similar name as you please disregard those emails" And then proceeded to tell me WHY these people were being denied, telling me even more information about their finances. I was so thrown off. She begged for us to still use them for our mortgage and like a dummy I said ok. Only because we were so far into this. I told her my concerns of her never answering my calls, getting us confused with other applicants, etc and she promised to do right. FOOLISH ME. So we find a house on a Saturday, very competitive house. We decided to put an offer down on Sunday. I called Danielle on Saturday to tell her we would need some info for our realtor to finish our offer letter the following morning. After HOURS she texts me (of course, no call back) and was said she would get right on it. Well we go to our realtors office the next morning and she tells me that she tried contacting Danielle three times, all in different forms of communication and never heard back. We went on a limb and used another mortgage lender that we had been recommended from friends and she did everything for us from start to finish in about 20 minutes. I called, texted, and emailed Danielle that we were not using them anymore and why. Danielle texted our realtor that next WEDNESDAY our information that we requested that Saturday. She ignored my messages of us saying we were giving them the boot. Had we stayed with TJC we would have lost our house that we were wanting. Danielle Charlnoes was easily the most unprofessional person I have EVER worked with and I am so thankful we went a different route. We know several couples in the home buying process and after hearing of our experience they have chosen to do their mortgages elsewhere. I hate that one person can taint a whole company's review, but our experience was ridiculous.

name: Adam Knorr
text:
My wife and I, were given Jason Lee’s (Mortgage Banker) contact info as a reference from a friend after a yearlong engagement with another mortgage company who could no longer service our loan request. With just over a month before closure, we were frantic and in search of a jumbo loan product that was within our budget. After explaining our situation to Jason, he calmly asked for an hour to do some research on his end and within 45 minutes was back in touch with a viable option.

Due to our previous relationship we were skeptical that we could get through the approval process ahead of a looming closure. Jason and his team did everything they committed to us up front and the final closing cost worksheet was within 3% of the estimated charges he provided us at the start.

Furthermore, my wife and I were able to speak to Jason anytime we wanted throughout the process. This was not needed since his 5 star team was consistently updating and communicating with us as well. Special shout out to Alyssa Weinberg (Loan Officer Assistant) and Crystal Bunn (Mortgage Loan Processor) for the excellent support and communication.

We highly recommend engaging with Jason Lee and his team. You will receive timely responses, honest assessments, and 5 star customer service throughout the process.

text: I want to thank Casey, Claire, Crystal and Jason Lee. They are a fantastic team and provide excellent customer service.

text: Buying a house is stressful.  You hear that your whole life. Their help, seamless application process, responsiveness to questions and guidance was truly unmatched by any company I have ever dealt with myself.  There is no doubt whatsoever that I would recommend using this company for any future loan, mortgage, refinancing or whatever the case maybe.  Thank you Jason Lee and your entire staff for allowing my son to actually enjoy and be able to be happy with purchasing a home instead of making it a extremely overwhelming and  difficult process.

text: If you are in need of a loan, look no further. Thomas Moore and staff are the best in the business. Thomas is organized, wise, patient, respectful, considerate, and the guru of all you need in buying a home. You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: This is wonderful to hear, Ashley! We are so happy you had a great experience! Thank you for your review!

name: Erin Stevens
text: If you need the best in the business, call Thomas Moore!  He's knowledgeable, friendly, and efficient.  He is a wonderful advocate in the mortgage business and will work hard to make your dreams come true!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and your review, Erin! We appreciate you!

name: GREG BURCHELL
text: Thomas was great. He answered every question I had every time I called, even on the weekend. I highly recommend his services if you’re looking for a mortgage or refi.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and your review, Maggie!  We appreciate you!

If you need a mortgage, these are THE people you need on your side!!!

resp.text: This is awesome to hear! Thank you for the great review, Tom!

It was a very small loan but I was treated like it was a Million Dollar Mortgage! I'm so Grateful! Wonderful experience! 👍

resp.text: This is great to hear! Thank you for sharing, Darylene!

text: I would definitely recommend First Bank Mortgage to anyone. Thomas Moore is very professional, but at the same time treats you like  he has known you for a long time. He keeps you informed and walks you through anything that you don't understand, without hesitation.

name: Leslie Godwin

text: I loved working with FirstBank Mortgage Partners, specifically Thomas Moore.  Thomas was very patient with us and helped make a process that was more complicated than typical seem easy. He was available to me after hours and on weekends. He never seemed bothered by my countless questions. I knew he was my advocate and a trusted advisor. I'm grateful for his hard work and determination, as well as his positive attitude and congenial spirit.

Ugh!

text: Staff is excellent, knowledable, and has time to spend with you.  They are also polite and accommodating.

text: Friendly with great rates. Wish they had more locations in baldwin county like Fairhope and Daphn. A mobile location or two as well, but I am grateful for this location. I believe the atm doesn't accept deposits only withdrawals but there is a over night drop box.

resp.text: Thank you Edmon for your 5-Star review and for your feedback on additional locations. We definitely like to hear where our members would like to see us. Thank you for being a member!

text: Awesome Place to handle your financial affairs.  Staff is very professional and friendly.

text: We had a great experience with Prime Lending. Adam was responsive, engaging, and very helpful throughout the process. We applied with several lenders but the excellent local customer service exceeded the rest.  Highly recommend Adam Fair and his team.

name: Howard Clink
text: I used them 2 years ago without any problem at all, and I was doing the loan process from out of state. I recommended them to some friends and Prime Lending has been nothing but a pain in their side, completely unprofessional, and definitely not helpful. I would suggest that if you’re looking for a home loan that you look elsewhere. They’re definitely not the same company they were 2 years ago.

name: Dan Jackson
text: Markus and his team did a great job. Responsive, fast, informative and helpful. Highly recommended.

name: jacob harris
text: Prime lending helped us refinance our home. They had the best rates. Our rep was Adam Fair. He always answered the phone anytime we had questions through out the process. He made sure everything was explained and made us feel comfortable in the process. Their team is professional and experienced. Highly recommend them.

name: Joel Wallace
text: Great service! Marcus provided excellent service

name: Kia Spencer
text: We have had the pleasure of working with Markus Spicer for the past few years. He is very thorough and makes sure that everything is done correctly. He is very patient and gets to know his clients and their needs. He is always there to answer any questions or address any concerns you may have. We are so thankful that we had the opportunity to work with him.

name: Michell Walker
text: PrimeLending employees were very polite. Although, the company sold my loan to Central Loan Administration and Reporting -worst company ever. I have/had excellent credit now I have to worry about this new company. Very disappointed. I would rather have gone with through Redstone FCU or Wells Fargo.

name: Ali Forth
text: Markus helped me out a lot with my loan. Had my preapproval letter to me within an hour of calling him. Thanks, Markus!

name: stacy lowrey
text: Markus is attentive to clients and offers competitive rates

name: Candice Barnes
text: We were in a situation where we made great money but not ready to buy a home yet. Our landlord suddenly sold our house and only gave us 35 days to find financing, find a home, get our offer accepted and pray our lender could close within 21 days. We met Markus Spicer and his assistant Allie and within 28 hours we were preapproved and on our way to find our home all while Covid-19 was shutting everything down. Markus was straight forward about what he could and couldn’t do, and said as long as we responded to his requests quickly, he could close within our time frame. Everything he advised us on was accurate, and he delivered on his word of being able to close on time in 3 weeks. Prime lending Huntsville paved the way for our family to own our own home and we couldn’t be more thankful If you want a lender and team who know their stuff and will tell it to straight while keeping their word, Markus Spicer and his team in Huntsville are the best hands down.

name: Brittany Watkins
text: I shopped around for the best lending company when I was looking to purchase my first home. I contacted Adam at PrimeLending, he got me an awesome interest rate, answered every question I had, and took care of everything! Today, I became a homeowner and I seriously couldn’t have done it without all of the help from Adam and the PrimeLending team!

name: Bill Fowler
text:
It's not really something you think about until you need it, but a quality, communicative, kind and supportive mortgage lender really, really matters when you're spending "house-level" money.

Alan and Ben at Prime Lending are doing something special. There's a reason all my friends have sought their business when buying and refinancing. They have the knowledge but also the attitude and friendship-first approach and makes the process painless and almost (dare I say) enjoyable.

name: Matt Tidmore
text: These guys are the best in the business at what they do. Don't listen to any negative reviews. They are false. I had na awesome experience throughout the home purchasing process. I highly recommend them! Thank you Tyler and Josh for everything!

name: Eddie Howington
text: Very helpful made it easy very happy

name: Kristen Bentley
text: They worked on weekends and nights to get us what we needed in order to buy our house! Markus Spicer was awesome!!

name: Raven Brooks
text: Alan, Ben and Angela were amazing during my home buying process.  I would highly recommend to anyone looking to purchase a home!!!

name: Jaclyn Klein
text: Tyler Wilson helped me close on my home in 2014. My previous Mortgage Lender, Saul Ginsberg,  had changed jobs without letting me know, and stole my paperwork and tried to put it through at his new company. He messed up my closing by 2-3 weeks. Tyler swooped in and saved the day and helped get me into my new home. I trusted him then, still trust him now. He will go above and beyond to help you as much as he can to get into your new home. I would highly recommend him.

name: Scott Stevens
text: Incredible lender in downtown Huntsville. The one click mortgage application is amazing!

name: K Staten
text: I have had the worst experience with Tyler Wilson and Joshua Broadhurst. I continue to email with questions and my paperwork but I never receive a response. Joshua always asks the same question every time I call when I get no response..."Uh, what time did you send the email". Tyler immediately put me off on him and I haven't heard from him since, which was almost 3 months ago. They are prolonging a processes that is already long enough. I am choosing to go with another company.

name: Justin Baldwin
text: Great service!

name: Chantelle Holden
text: I had a GREAT experience with Prime Lending.  Tyler was AWESOME!!!!

text: Everyone has always been extremely professional and friendly to me. Anytime that I needed assistance I have been able to sit down and discuss things out with the employees. I highly recommend Pen Air Credit!

text: BEWARE!!!  Assistant Manager allows employees to notarized documents without the presence of the individual being there! Also goes into accounts and stalks their accounts and memorizes account numbers! This is why I no longer use them and have since opened up an account at Alabama Credit Union!

text: Only one line out of 3 open for live teller. That is not good business. I had to wait in line 15 minutes.  I’m very unhappy. When is the lobby ever going to open up

I am not currently a member, however I am considering moving my personal banking to PenAir simply because I witnessed first hand the exceptional service they provided to my Aunt like they were her family as well. This branch has great staff so pleasant and welcoming. True southern hospitality.

resp.text: Wow, Candice! We are thrilled to hear that you are considering moving your banking relationship to Pen Air! We would love to be your trusted financial partner, and look forward to serving you! Thank you for sharing your experience with us.

name: Joseph Preite
text: Went in today to take care of some business and everyone is always so nice there. I love the new live Atm's. I have my loans there so will be moving my personal and business accounts there first thing in the morning. Billie will bend over backwards to help you out with whatever banking issues you may have.

resp.text: Hi, Joseph! We are thrilled to receive a 5-start rating from you! Thank you for taking the time to let us know of the level of member service we are providing to you. We value our relationship with you, and look forward to being your continued financial partner. PS, the LIVE machine are pretty awesome, aren't they?

name: Tarius Sledge
text: Amazing

name: Tori Applegate
text: I had an account get overdrawn. I missed the thirty day pay back mark by TWO DAYS. I didn't get a letter or anything of the sort. They didn't say it went to collections when I paid it off. The account never closed and stayed in "good standing". Got a ping that I had a new derogatory mark on my credit, a collection. I went up to the credit union as soon as I saw it and asked if anything could be done. They said no. So thanks for nothing at all. I will be closing my account ASAP and will recommend penair to no one. AL Credit Union is such a better choice and they forgive if you forget by a day or two to pay something. Not to mention they try to help you build your credit not ruin it.

name: Jennifer May
text:
I have been a member for over 10 years and a CSR at the Foley Alabama branch persuade my husband while banking there. He has left my 3 kids and I for said woman and the bank decided to handle it by terminating my membership and promoting her to managers position. Pen Air has no ethics or moral standing.
On its website, the credit union boils down its brand promise to this: “We promise to value and respect the trust you’ve placed in us.”
If only that were true...

name: Brandon Sylvester
text: I have been with this credit union for 12 years and they are always friendly and helpful.  Felisa Merryfield Helped me with my HELOC and a recreational loan.  She was fast and helped find the best loan to suit my situation.

name: Ethan Lewis
text: It's like a family here. Great bank. Fantastic service. Best option around hands down. I'm so glad I switched from Regions.

resp.text: Ethan we're so glad you feel like family! We value our members and respect and value the trust you've placed in us. We couldn't be happier. Thank you for the 5Star Review, and thank you for being a Pen Air Member!

name: Good Citizen (Good Citizen)
text: Very pleased with the overall experience at this branch in general. I'm especially pleased with Rachael Hambric's service and professionalism. I have been a long time customer of Pen Air's, have obtained multiple loans and Rachael has been my POC in every single one. Great experience overall.

resp.text: Alain - Thank you for taking the time to leave us with a 5 Star Review and your special comments about Rachael Hambric's service and professionalism. Thank you for being a loyal member of Pen Air!

name: Gus Delafuente
text: Always get helped fast and proper.

name: Patrease Durgin
text: I had recently went to this credit union in Foley to apply for a loan so that I can get me another car because an old car that I have is about to break down on me. The people there that I talked who works there were nice, but I hate the policy of this credit union that one of them described to me which is for example: If you have filed for bankruptcy within the last 10 years and haven't established much credit and you've never gotten a loan and paid off that loan, then you won't be able to get a loan from them because obviously they feel that your'e probably not going to pay that loan back to them. So they aren't going to give you a chance. Well how can one get their foot in the door to get a loan from them and then pay it off??? I don't think that is fair at all!! Such a stupid policy!!

resp.text: Patrease - Thank you for reaching out to us and provide us your feedback. It is important that we understand the needs of our members and listen to their pain points. We would love the continue the conversation with you to better understand your situation and see how we can develop a solution to get your credit repaired. We are hear to help. Please feel free to reach out to us at memberservicecenter@penair.org. Thank you again for your feedback.

name: Nick Krupinski
text: Very great bank, with amazing staff.

name: Robert Coats
text: Wonderful staff

name: Mark H
text: The ladies at the drive thru window rock and pen air is the best banking option I've found. Please keep up the good work and I'll continue to use you loyaly!!! Mark

resp.text: Mark H thank you for the 5-Star review and the kind words about our Foley team in the Drive Thru. We know you have several choices available to you and want to thank you for choosing Pen Air and for being a loyal member!

name: shannon moore
text: I have been with this bank for over 2 years and their service just keeps getting worse & worse. The people at the Foley Branch are pretty nice but there is no way to contact them unless you drive to the bank.They dont allow customers to call direct. What kind of crap is that????   It is no longer personal or hometown , just cold call centers and crappy customer service over the phone. Really disappoints me since I trust them enough to keep my money.

resp.text: Shannon - Thank you for taking the time to write this review. It's important to us to hear back from our members on how we are doing. We respect and value the trust you have placed in us and would like to continue the conversation. We'll be reaching out to you to understand more. Thank you again. Respectfully ~ Pam

resp.text: Thank you for the 5Star Review. We appreciate you taking the time to provide us this review and appreciate you being a Pen Air member even more!

We happen to like the folks at our Foley location also and hope they continue to provide you with exceptional service and treat you with respect. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us in the future if you have any questions or concerns.

name: Randall Strain
text: I agree with Shannon. I want a bank with a local number. I hate calling Florida when there is a problem. The last time I called I spoke to a Hindu that couldn't speak English. How did she get a job in customer service? It never stops with Penair. Just when you think Penair can't do anything more stupid than before , they rebuild their website. Now by the time I recieve an access code their web site is timed out. They think that no one will need to make a balance transfer for days at a time. They think everyone is psychic and can foretell the future. I wouldn't hire a Penair official to carry out my garbage , because I don't think they have the mental capacity to do the job.

name: Shane Lindsey
text: Great staff love banking here

resp.text: Hi, Shane! Thank you for the 5-star review! We value your feedback, whether it's positive or negative, and appreciate you taking the time to let us know how we're doing. We will make sure to pass this along to the Foley location team. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Peg Aldrich
text: The people who work here earn their pay, and my respect.

resp.text: Peg thank you so much for taking the time to give us a 5Star review and provide your feedback. Respect is a guiding principle at Pen Air and we work hard to make sure our members can trust us, feel valued, and know that we respect the fact that they've chosen us with their finances. Thank you for being a member at Pen Air!

name: Jason Millsap
text: Can't contact local office directly to get info on hours. It's personnel seem cold at times & bored.

resp.text: Jason thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. You actually can reach the branch directly. For the Foley location, just press extension 7002, or the next time you are in the branch and prefer to deal with a specific individual just ask for their extension and they will gladly provide that to you. We hope this helps. Thank you again for your feedback.

Great plaće to bank

text: Worst possible bank to use for a mortgage loan! They lie to you during the whole process and when you confront them about it, they blame someone/something else. Unless you want a bubble payment and have them lie to you, do not use them.

name: G W
text: We applied for a mortgage with Scott Nelson. It was a great experience! He is very quick to respond and provided world class service. He showed us how to provide our documentation so we could help the process go smoothly. NobleBank & Trust has high integrity and values. We are now the owners of a beautiful home.

name: Jane Brown
text: Anniston, Oxford & the new Heflin branches have the most amazing, helpful employees!  Anything I have ever needed, from documents to new debit cards have been mine quickly, with a smile!

name: Sherria Rudolph
text: I have been banking with them for about 5 years now.

name: Dylan Hulsey
text: Worst banking experience ever, let my account get hacked random phone numbers without even notifying me, took over a month to get me my debit card, requires you to change your password every 6 weeks because their system isn't secure enough if you don't, changed my address to one that doesn't exist without notifying me, the list goes on and on and on. Just do yourself a favor if you are thinking about banking with noble and DON'T DO IT.

resp.text: Dylan, we apologize for any issues you are having if you could please contact us at 256-741-1800 and we can get to the bottom of the problem.

name: Danielle Fair
text: The anniston and piedmont branches have the nicest and most helpful employees. Savannah, Nikki, Leslie, Latha, and Haley are all part of the pleasant experiences I've had banking with noble for personal and business accts.

name: I.O.U
text: Staff here is so awesome. thank you for allowing me to be part of the noble Trust Bank family

name: Will Sullivan
text: Jeff Henderson and the team at Method Mortgage were great to work with. They made the entire process from start to finish easy and seamless. I appreciated the quick responses and willingness to walk us through the process when we had questions. Highly recommend and will be using again in the future.

name: Brittany Costello
text: Working with Brandon and the team at method mortgage were the easiest part of my home buying experience. I highly recommend using them for your mortgage needs!

name: Allen Arnold
text: I have used Roger Steur three times for financing or refinance.  I still shop around each time, yet Roger always earns my business by finding the best mortgage plan.  Roger and his staff are easy to work with.

name: Ross U
text: Gary worked hard with my family during our original purchase and again with our refi to stay in close contact to ensure we were comfortable with a the necessary requirements and for locking in our rate at the best times possible. Very thankful for his help and service.

name: Carmichael Matthew
text: Our mortgage was the easiest part about buying a new home. The team proactively communicated every step of the way and we really felt that they were looking out for us. The builder pushed our closing back several times and the Method team worked hard to get us closed before the holidays. Couldn’t have been a better experience.

name: Joseph Cox
text: Top notch service and great rates.  The mortgage process is complicated and having someone local and knowlegable working with us is invaluable both in terms of completing the sale and peace of mind.  We've used Roger Steur twice and can't say enough good things about him personally and professionally.

name: Casie Coggin
text: Method Mortgage was fantastic to work with!  Ashley Johnson and the support staff were very quick to respond to any questions and very easy to work with.  I highly recommend Ashley Johnson and Method Mortgage!

name: Chris Dobbs
text: Complete professionalism and very quick to communicate with your home owner's insurance company when needed. Method Mortgage partner Roger Steur even came to my refi closing-I have never had that happen before.  100% recommend.

name: Lydia Lin
text: so nice

name: John Parker
text: The branch manager Jerhlyn (or however it could be spelled) lied repeatedly to me. One example is that a 'permanently closed account' could be reopened with a charge. This is false. These people are incompetent and liars.

name: Trevor Sealy
text: Go to regions these people operate like it’s 1979.

name: Lee Hill
text: rude

name: Monique Buford
text: The process was so smooth. If you do your part as far as turning in documents then you don’t have to worry about anything. My realtor was excellent and I would recommend her to anybody. Janel choice if you see this I appreciate you more than you know.

name: K Harris
text: Everything was wonderful.  I recommend to anyone that is looking for a company that appreciates the customer. We felt safe in their hands and they never let us down.

name: Stephan Rotter
text: The team at InterLinc are incredible.   I've used 2 other lenders previously for investment properties and I've felt that I always need to "direct traffic" or follow up to ensure the correct actions were being done.   InterLinc was on top of the loan every step along the way and in constant communication with me which truly made my feel secure and I felt as i was their #1 customer.  bravo.

name: Dionne Blount-Robinson
text: This Is The Place To Go!!!!!! This is an awesome group of people. As first time home buyers Shelley and Ansley really helped us out. They were our “Go to People!” We had tones of questions & needed a lot of feedback. These ladies were there every step of the way. When another bank I use made it easy for them to cash their (BB&T, a competitor’s) checks I wrote them from my BB&T account, I moved my account elsewhere. Their online banking was easy to use and robust but the local service couldn’t be much worse.

name: kurt mccarthy
text: My loan officer was great, but the company completely discriminates against you if you weren't able to work due to your service connected injuries. Once you get surgery and are feeling better they will still hold it against you that you weren't able to work prior. Just rich investors chasing the dollar like they do during the war machine.

resp.text:
Hi Kurt,
Though I am glad your experience with you loan officer was a good one, I am saddened to know you felt discriminated against due to injury. As far as employment goes, most applicants are examined on a case-by-case basis, and employment is only one piece of the total borrower evaluation. Lenders will look at how long you've been employed, the types of jobs you held and how many periods of unemployment are in your history. That being said, the "gold standard" of employment for lenders is 2 years of stable, reliable, full-time employment.

I'm sorry to hear about your frustration. Our teams are passionate about helping veterans and service members use their hard-earned benefit, and we are sorry that we were unable to provide financing. If you have more feedback you would like to share, I invite you to get in contact with our Client Advocate team at 1-800-212-5200 or ClientAdvocate@veteransunited.com. The team is available for constructive conversation regarding your experience in our effort to continuously learn and improve.
-Claire S., Client Advocate

name: J McClain
text:
Seller Beware!
This outfit will take you the seller to the cleaners. We paid for the buyers home insurance for a year, plus 4 months, 1 year home warranty protection, property tax for 1 year for the buyer to go into escrow,  plus interest at 27% for the buyers from the time they started the loan until the 1st of the next month, over $2,000 for the loan origination fee. The closing agent was supposed to give us a break down before we went to closing, they did not! It took over 2 months to get to closing and we were exausted and at that point just ready to get it behind us! If you are selling you home to anyone who wants to use the VA home loan program to finance their home please beware! You will be taken to the cleaners!
NEVER AGAIN WILL WE ALLOW THIS TO HAPPEN TO US!!!!

Notice! The 5 star reviews are from the buyers, not the sellers!

text: Our transaction was unique because we relocated from 2300 miles away. We began working with Justin at our home in CA and continued during our trip to our new home in Alabama.
