We highly recommend him to anyone who is looking to purchase or refinance a home!  Thank you so much, Justin!

name: kevin knight
text: Barbara Gaston was awesome! She did exactly what she said she would! That is rare today! I would recommend her to anyone wanting to borrow money to purchase Real Estate!

name: Ambur Love
text: Outstanding service when buying my first home! Justin made the process easy and explained everything to me very well. He was the best person I worked with when buying my house.

name: Charlie Overby
text: Justin Dorroh and Beverly Wheatley at Assured Financial were probably in my opinion the best in Lending I have ever delt with. They made my process in getting my home extremely easy and were so helpful anytime I ever needed them. I will always recommend Justin and Beverly to anyone looking to buy a home. Thanks Assured Financial for all the hard work and efforts in helping me out with getting my new home.

name: walker biggers (Walker Shannon)
text: For all your home loan needs. Best place in town.

name: Scot McKinney
text: Highly Recommended! A+

name: My brothers Keeper
text: Avid listener to Conrad podcasts and was trying to refinance so gave them a chance. They gave us a rate that was two points better than my credit union. That is where the good things about this company ended. It was followed by incorrect paperwork, delayed closing because of a problem that we had to find and inform them of, and completely ghosting us up to and including during closing. They "accidentally" took an extra $700 from us that the company they sold our mortgage to before the ink was dry could give us back if Conrad's people would simply send them a letter saying they screwed up. 3 weeks we have been getting excuses and the blame game but still no letter written so that I can get my money back. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!

name: MICHAEL JUNCAJ
text: Thank you to Conrad and Eric for helping me out with my mortgage! Even though they weren't able to save me money right now, Eric worked hard to ensure I had the best deal now, gave me advice on how to set myself up for success, and was very easy to work with! I have worked with mortgage companies before, but these guys were the kindest, most humble individuals that made me not feel like a customer; I was a friend. Eric even set me up a time table for follow up. I cannot wait to work with them again in the future. Let me know when you come to Detroit again. First round is on me!

name: Megan Howell
text: We purchased our home using this company in 2019! Larry gave us a good contact for a realtor, who helped us find our home! He also gave us resources to help find our homeowners insurance, which I had no idea about at the time. We just finished refinancing our home with a better interest rate, and Larry and his team once again made it a quick and seamless process! Great company and great people!

name: Cass Stormer
text:
Everything that Conrad says in his ads are 100% true!  Our experience with Jimmy, Jennifer, and Steve couldn't have been better.  We moved into our house a little over a year ago and weren't sure if re-financing was even a worthwhile experience.  Come to find out, we were able to have a similar monthly payment, lower interest rate, and less years on the loan.  Assuming we stay in this house, we will pay our house off 4 years earlier and save about $50,000!

For months I was telling my wife about Save with Conrad and she still can't stop commenting on how fast and easy the process was.  We probably could've closed almost 2 weeks sooner had our insurance company not dragged their feet on providing a document.  They are on it and do not waste any time!  I've been telling everyone I know about this experience.  My mom and her husband recently re-financed with another company and it took months to close.  She's so jealous of us and I keep telling her that she should've listened to me and gone with my man, Conrad!

There's a reason why he's as successful as he is.  He can help you too and you owe it to yourself, and your family, to at least see what they can do for you!

name: Travis Almanzan
text: Fast and a easy experience. Everyone was great and the service and communication was a 1!

name: W Nendza
text:
Everyone has a dream of where they'd like to end up. Ours was a cute house with a quick walk to the beach. We found it. And David & Conrad and the crew at 1st Family Mortgage made it happen.

I am self-employed. My finances are weird. And this house just seemed like another dream that I couldn't figure out how to navigate towards. Now I've been listening to Conrad for years on his podcasts talking about Chicken Salad and Mortgages, so I figured what the hell, let's see what they can do. They did this. David worked tirelessly with me the whole way and never let me give up when I thought we couldn't find a way. But they did...and here we are.

Thank you! 1st Family Mortgage is now part of my family, and they should be part of yours as well.

name: Anthony Diaz
text: Diane and Team have been great!  They helped us get our AZ dream home last year and now with a refi just helped us save another $50k. This amazing Team has just secured our business for life!

name: Shawn Baerlocher
text: What an outstanding experience with 1st Family Mortgage.  When one of the big mortgage companies completely dropped the ball, 1st Family was able to rescue our day with their efficiency and personal commitment to make things right. Highly recommend this first class organization!

name: Issita Marie
text: Fantastic customer service from an amazing team! They were so accommodating to the time difference (I’m in Japan) and very thorough in answering all my questions and assessing all possible options.  Best part? I am saving $89.0K throughout the live of the loan!!! If there is a possibility to refinance in the future, this is the team I will be entrusting to do so!

name: j shafer
text: This was the easiest and most professional loan company we have ever worked with. Larry, Phillip and Holly were professional and friendly making sure we understood every step of the process and answering all of our questions in a timely manner.  We knocked over 1.5 points off of our interest rate, took cash out to pay down debt and repairs and our payment didn't increase. Amazing team, amazing experience. Thank you!

name: Ryan Amundson
text: Just like the rest of the one star reviews if it's not cut and dry I wouldn't try First Family.  Signed paperwork for a mortgage and was told after the fact they can't do it.  Waiting for a refund for the inspection fee that will never happen.  They were at least polite but they do not have their stuff in order.  Would recommend going somewhere else.

name: Robert Kunz, Jr
text: Jimmy was amazing to work with. He stuck w/ me as I was going through a reassessment and allowed me to figure this out before revisiting refinancing. It was worth the wait. On a house that was purchased in 2019 Jimmy was able to shave off 3.5 years which will save me ~$80k over the life of my loan and even saved me $20/month on my payment. Can’t recommend them enough for your mortgage needs.

name: joe from htown
text: I drive for work so it was extremely helpful to go through the process all by text. Derek was always a text or phone call away. Added closing costs and a loan to pay off credit cards and still knocked off 8 years off my payoff date.  So easy. Make the call

name: Michael Sanchez
text: Excellent, excellent experience!  Conrad and the gang are truly in it to help people, and it shows.  First-rate customer service and in the end, we got a killer rate and will be able to pay off our mortgage in half the time.  Call them TODAY if you're thinking about a mortgage--you can not go wrong with these great folks!

name: Susan Garner
text: I bought my first house 4 years ago and barely understand ESCROW, much less the refinancing process. Home Town Lenders helped me take advantage of low interest rates, while shaving a year off my mortgage, lowering my monthly payment, and converting an FHA to a conventional. They were patient through all my questions and took an individualized look at my income/debt situation. Thanks Loree and Jennifer!

name: Eric Jasperson
text: Great service and excellent support throughout the process. Stuart answered every question and was there when I needed him from start to finish. Highly recommend to anyone interested. Thanks Stuart and First Family team.

name: Steve Putman
text:
The entire team at First Family was a pleasure to work with. Knowledgeable, good-humored, and not afraid to admit that they might not know everything, which is refreshing in this day and age. My transaction went smoothly, even though my situation is a little different than most. Great job!

Now if I only could have had a years' worth of Ad-Free Shows thrown in...:D

name: Matthew Allen
text: Easy to work with and the best customer service I have come across.  Derek was amazing from start to finish and the closing was done in our home.  I cannot recommend this company more.  If I can give more then 5 stars, I would.

name: A.W. Lawson (Archbishop Adub)
text: The only way to rate the First Family Mortgage team any higher would have been to sign the closing papers in the Tokyo Dome! We ran into some issues trying to close my refinance by the end of the year, which were out of our control, and Larry and his team worked hard to get it done. I was able to eliminate 10 years off of my loan, get some cash, and cut my rate in half with little change to my monthly payment. The best part is I can now tell all my buddies that my mortgage guy is married to Ric Flair’s daughter! I see where Conrad gets his silky smoothness...it’s from Larry “The Legend” Thompson!

name: Michael Vera
text: I've had many bad experiences with buying & refinancing.  My experience with 1st Family was first class, easy & overall a pleasant experience.  Derek & Jennifer are awesome!  To be honest, I was skeptical that this process was going too smooth & anxiety levels rose waiting for something bad to happen but we closed & I slept like a BABY!  It was NUTS!  Derek & crew saved me over $91k off the life of my new load & cut my interest rate by almost half!  Thank you 1st Mortgage, you guys are the real deal!

name: Robert Sweet
text: Conrad, Stuart and the entire team at 1st family mortgage were a dream to work with. They are very knowledgeable and friendly people. Stuart was excellent at answering all my questions and explaining things to me in a very simple manor that I could understand. This was the smoothest experience I've ever had with refinancing my loan. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to buy, refinance, or simply get a loan.

name: Jonathan Salazar
text: Top notch customer service! A great experience made even better by Eric Bishoff. Yes my attempt at a refinance was handled by Eric Bishoff! Thank you Save with Conrad

name: Sunnie Brown
text: Just don’t. That’s really all I want to say. What should have been a quick closing as we were purchasing a home from our family took around 5 months from the first time we contacted them. We had 3 or 4 different people e-mailing us (no one would pick up the phone and call) and none of them were communicating with each other or on the same page. Our closing costs changed several times. We didn’t even know the final number for closing costs until the day of. When they sent a notary out he didn’t even know what he was coming for. I’m not going to throw names out there because everyone was nice but this is the most unorganized and careless company.

name: Josh Kelley
text: I had never done a refinance before period Derek and his crew made it as easy as possible. Anytime that I had questions they responded quickly and were very helpful. They saved me $1500 a year on my mortgage and also 2 months without a mortgage payment is always pretty awesome. I would definitely recommend them to anybody.

name: James Bergstrom Jr
text: The entire experience was awesome. I heard about 1st Family by listening to Grilling JR. My mom and sister each both had horrible experiences with other companies. Nothing but delays and multiple changes to closing dates. I experienced none of that. David and Diane were fantastic and I could not have asked for better support through this entire process. We closed on the date that was promised, I never had to send the same documents multiple times and my favorite part was it was all done online no delays. Thank you again, you have no idea how much this means to me.

name: Jason Disney
text: Larry and the rest at 1st Family Mortgage were awesome to work with! They made the refinancing process so easy and efficient and they worked hard to get the deal we needed for a lower mortgage payment and to save some money. I will recommend 1st Family Mortgage to any one that I know. Awesome job!

name: Ryan Jackson
text:
Let me tell you something brother!!! Ya know, if you’re anything like me and been listening to Conrad for several years now, well dude you’ve heard him talk about saving people money.  Ya know somethin Mean Gene, it’s not just a gimmick! It’s NOT rumor and innuendo!
I found myself in a lot of credit card debt.  $20,000 in debt actually.  Making the minimum monthly payments was hard to do, I mean I’ve been paying nearly $750 a month on minimum credit card payments!
I have heard the ads for at least 2 years now and just assumed because of my mediocre credit and situation there was no way out.  But Stuart and Holly made me realize that I want helpless!
Conrad’s team took a look at the numbers and my situation.  They took me from a 4.75% interest rate on my mortgage down to a 3.1% rate!  Not only that, but I was able to get $20,000 cash money to pay off my credit card debt!!!! The best part?  My mortgage payment is exactly the same as it was before! I am literally saving $750 per month thanks to Conrad and his team at 1st Family Mortgage!
So what are you waiting for!? Let Conrad and his team make chicken salad with your situation!  Whatcha gonna do brother, when Conrad and the team at 1st Family Mortgage run wild on you!!!!!!

name: Nora Moss
text: Carlos was a pleasure to work with. He went above and beyond to check-in with us throughout our refinance process and thoroughly answered any questions we had. He was able to find us a great rate and has saved us over $120,000! His timely response was something I valued most. We will continue to recommend him to all our family and friends.

name: b morris
text:
These guys did in JUST 12 BUSINESS DAYS what another 'very well known ' major lender couldn't get done in 7 months. That's right 7 freaking months, they were-are a joke, total waste of time.  800 credit score no debit and it was 7 months of B.S. that dragged out 7 and it still never got closed.  Then i contacted Conrad and boom!! Done
To anyone needing a refi, new purchase whatever don't bother with anyone else get in touch with Conrad and has team at 1st Family they are first class all the way. Prompt, curious,  and good god lighting fast.  Larry and Holly were great! Not all lenders are created equal, 1st Family is where its at.

name: family dosch
text: We recently refinanced. We worked with Carlos Carter and he is amazing! While shopping around, before any commitment, Carlos helped us save over $1500 on our annual property taxes! After we committed, he helped us reduce our interest rate substantially and we will save over $140k for the life of our mortgage AND our monthly payments went down $400 a month AND we rolled closing costs into the mortgage!!!!!!!  We will always recommend Carlos. Not only for saving us so much money, but also for being available and responsive.  We did our research and spoke to quite a few mortgage lenders and received the best customer service and best rates from Carlos and 1st Family.  If you’re shopping around for financing, 1st Family Mortgage is the place to go!

name: Andy Hesley
text: Diane and her team were very helpful during this very important purchase. I couldn't be more pleased with my experience. Thanks again!

name: Barry Walsh
text: Jimmy and the crew at 1st Family Mortgage took care of refinance and answered all the questions that my wife and I had. They saved money for us monthly, and by working with them through the mortgage process we were able to take some additional funds we generated and pay off some existing debt - which allows us to save even more money each month. I cannot say enough good things about team at 1st Family Mortgage and cannot recommend them more highly. Five stars is not enough!

name: David Mata
text: I am a first time home buyer this year and heard about 1st family through Conrad Thompsons podcast business. Even though I already had a lender working on my purchase, I wanted to shop around.  Christian with 1st family spent a ton of time with me giving great advice! He called me when he said he was going to and went above and beyond to steer me in the right direction.  Once we decide to refinance our home, we will be calling Christian with 1st family!

name: Kathryn Gouge
text: I am an avid listener to all the podcast (Tony and Conrad are my favorites though). I heard numerous adds about refi and didn’t think it would be helpful since I had just refinanced two years ago. I finally figured I would give it a try since I had nothing to lose.   I did lose something however, nearly 60k from my total loan. Thanks for saving me nearly 60k over the course of the loan. Conrad’s team were great and a special thank you to my main contact during the process EB!!!

name: Jerry Young
text: Great experience, gave us all the options that were available to us and helped us every step of the process Big thanks to the entire team at 1st Family

name: Mac McKinney
text: I could not be any more thankful for Conrad and his team. Derek was extremely helpful and understanding with our situation, and made the process absolutely stress free. Married with 4 kids, our life can be pretty hectic. The all electronic process is super easy to follow, and makes keeping up with documents digitally a snap. The only hang ups always seemed to be on my end. In the end, we locked in at a lower rate, paid off our credit card and auto debt, and have better credit to show for it. For the first time since I financed my first car 23 years ago, I didn’t sit down to sign documents with a gnawing doom feeling in my gut. So, yeh, I am sending a huge thank you to Derek, Jennifer, and Conrad for being too sweeeet! Now, I can get that coveted subscription to AdFreeShows.com.

name: Ben Walters
text: Conrad is the man!  We are so glad we chose to work with him on our refinancing.  Derek was awesome to work with and deserves a raise.  He answered every question we had quickly and completely.  Being able to do most of it through text and e-mail messages made things convenient and easy.  We were able to drop our interest rate by almost 3 points, which is going to save us an unbelievable amount of money.  We couldn't be happier with our experience and will recommend them to anyone we can.  Thank you Conrad, Derek, and everyone else that helped us.  You are the best!

name: Bryan Arendale
text: Very friendly service. They even went the extra mile and gave me advice to raise my credit score and got me a lower rate. Thanks for everything 1st family mortgage!

name: Dale Bemis
text: Just like you hear on the podcasts, this was a quick and easy way to save some money and cut a few years off of my mortgage. A simple phone call and I had my options and made my decision. Someone brought the documents to me and it was a done deal. Highly recommended.

name: Troy Marty
text: I was a difficult client, I admit. My previous experience was less than satisfactory to say the least. EVERYONE at 1st Family handled my “pricklyness” with professionalism and class. I highly recommend this company

name: Shawn Barseghian
text: A+++++. The best experience I've had ever buying a house. I highly recommend and will use them again in the future.

name: Eric Miller
text: Very easy process! Being able to do everything online and communicate by text and email was convenient with my schedule. I was able to reduce my rate and save 7 yrs of payments. Derek was great to work with! He was always available for questions and got back to me quickly. He even hooked me up with Brian at Goosehead Insurance. Brian was great! He got me a better homeowners and car insurance rate. Overall terrific service!

name: Amanda Clark
text: Carlos and team were there by our side every step of the way through the refinance process! Our family is very grateful for their help! Would definitely (and already have!) recommend to anyone looking to buy or refinance!

name: Matt Dillon
text:
We've been homeowners for more than 25 years now, and Derek Jones is the best mortgage loan consultant with whom we've ever worked. First Family Mortgage has helped us save more than $1,200 per month on our home loan payments, and also accelerated our loan term more than 2 years! We're definitely going to call First Family Mortgage again for our future mortgage loan needs.

Respectfully,
Matt and Jennifer Dillon
Phoenixville, PA

name: Dustin Eck
text: The group at 1st Family made refinancing painless. They answered any and all questions we had  on which loan was best for our needs. They were able to cut years off our mortgage as well as savings of $50,000+ in interest payments.

name: Bryan Harmon
text: I was extremely pleased with my experience at Save With Conrad. Jimmy was helpful every step of the way. After the initial phone call, almost everything was done through email and text which was very helpful. I would recommend Save With Conrad to anyone looking to save money. We were able to lower our payment and knock years off our loan.

name: Chris
text: I've used 1st Family 3 times now to refinance. Derek has always been extremely helpful and has worked to make sure we got the best rate available. I definitely recommend giving him a call when you are shopping for a mortgage.

name: Ryan Barrett
text: 1FMC was wonderful to work with, they knocked 13 years off my mortgage and kept my asking payment lower than I requested! Diane R was very easy to work with and answered questions within minutes over email! I would recommend to anyone to use them for any of your refinance needs!

name: H B
text: Conrad, Jimmy and everybody at 1st Family mortgage were easy to deal with. It was by far the easiest and smoothest refi I’ve ever done. Only had to send documents they requested one time and no explanations for every large purchase made during the refi process. Definitely would recommend and will repeat business.

name: randy getz
text:
I had a great experience with 1st family mortgage.
I got an intrest rate under 3 percent also 3 years off my mortgage and lower monthly payments. The staff was great Derek who was my advisor was able to be accessed through phone calls and texts. It was a smooth process anyone looking to save money on their home should try here first.

name: Adam Hensel
text: Couldn’t ask for a better experience. Derek was awesome and even though we had some issues on our end that took awhile to fix, Derek was calling every week to check back with us. We ended up cutting eight years and over $120000.00 off our mortgage. I’ve already recommended them to friends.

name: John Price
text:
I have to say the disappointment with the experience is beyond words.  Everyone on the team at start very nice but things fell apart and the experience became very frustrating.

Will not use them for anything nor support the podcast anymore.

name: Kelly Dockery
text: I can't say enough good things about my refi experience with Carlos. From the very first phone call, I knew that he was going to work hard to help me take advantage of the incredibly low rates out there right now. He was able to answer every single question I had right away in a very professional manner. He was very prompt in communicating via email, phone call, or text message, which kept my mind at ease that everything behind the scenes was running smoothly. He saved me a lot of money and we even closed sooner than expected. I am extremely happy with the service I received and very appreciative of Carlos being so attentive even though it's such a busy time right now. Thank you, Carlos!

name: B R
text: Easy to work with, professional and thorough. Very pleased with the service I received from 1st Family Mortgage!

name: Brittney Lucas
text: Had the worst experience with Jim Erwin or lack thereof. The process started off great and he asked for supporting paperwork for income and said he would get the figures together for a pre approval and then ghosted us. He wouldn’t reply to any messages we sent him asking for updates. If you need anything done this isn’t the place to go and your time would be better spent on another company for your mortgage needs. Very unprofessional.

name: Jr B
text: 1sr Family Mortgage helped me refinance my home.  From beginning to end they made the process incredibly easy.  Larry presented me the options available and I picked what was best for me.  I initially tried to refinance through my previous mortgage holder and it was a complete nightmare.  If you are considering refinancing your home do yourself and your family a favor and get a quote from 1st Family. I will recommend savewithconrad.com to anyone and everyone who inquires about a mortgage or a refinance.

name: Casey Russell
text: I couldn’t be more pleased with using 1st Family for my home refi. Carlos and Conrad went above and beyond to help me lock in the best rate and ensure my complete satisfaction. I highly would highly recommend this company for your refinance needs.

name: Megan Pinson
text: These guys are where it’s at. I couldn’t have asked for better service when buying a home. They made it easy and fun, and they saved us money. For real. Even in the dark ages of 2020, this experience was a joy. I love y’all!

name: P1 Darthballz
text: I want to thank Holly for the help and explaining every step of the way!

name: Mike Gutierrez
text: From the beginning, Francine, Derek and the whole team were welcoming. It felt great to have a personal touch to the refinance process even though it was all done virtually. We went from a 30yr loan to a 15 yr loan. We knew the payment would go up, but the potential savings was worth it. In the end we saved $80k by refinancing. Our monthly payments went up slightly, but the savings from the cash out will help us pay off debt and keep more money in our pockets each month.

name: Anthony Dinsmore
text: My agent was David Digesu and I had a situation that required special attention. It was a little complex for the first agent I was given, so he referred me to David. He found a way around my circumstance and got me pre approved for an excellent rate. I was able to close on the contract date and am overall very satisfied with his service.

name: Richie Wong
text: Conrad Thompson’s team is awesome. His team of Clint, David, Diane, and more lead me through my first home buying process like Bret Hart leading Davey Boy Smith to a 10* match in SummerSlam 92. I highly recommend First Family Mortgage. I hope I use them for my 2nd home and more

name: Aaron Riley
text: Jimmy and the whole gang did an amazing job. Jimmy was just a text away. No matter when I sent the message I got a very quick response and very thorough answers.  Everything that could be done online was; which made things very easy.

name: Jose Salazar
text: David and all of the team at 1st Family made me feel at ease and took care of everything we needed in a very timely fashion! They answered all of my questions even on nights and weekends.. definitely made us feel like we were important clients .. would recommend to anyone looking for a home loan!

name: Jessica Booth
text: We had an awesome experience.  Derek was on top of things and very friendly.  Great people and great place to get a refi.

name: ryan sheriff
text: They are very easy to work with. The site they use to do the paperwork is very easy to use and makes it a breeze to do. Jimmy that did my refinance was easy to communicate with and always answered my questions in a timely manner. He also got me a better deal than rocket mortgage. I definitely recommend them.

name: Matthew Miller
text: Conrad and his team are great. I have refinanced before and this was the easiest experience I’ve had. I worked with Derek and being able to text him with any questions was really convenient. I was able to do the whole process from home and even during the pandemic we were able to get it done. I would definitely recommend Conrad and his team for any mortgage needs.

name: Ian Riccaboni
text: Conrad's team provided world-class, knowledgeable service and answered all questions quickly while working around my schedule to ensure the best possible refinance.

name: Kyle Strawser
text: Easiest refi I have ever done. Everything went smooth and easy. Conrad's team handled everything. I didn't have to even leave my house to sign the closings dox.  I snagged an interest rate in the 2's, saved 70k over the life of the loan vs. my last mortgage, and was able to go down to a 25 year term. I highly recommend 1st family mortgage. All of the hours I spent listening to Conrad's podcasts really paid off.

name: Daniel Williams
text: Great people, very friendly and knowledgable. Larry, Conrad and gang will help get you great rates and save you MONEY!

name: Kelly Hoopingarner
text: Jimmy was AMAZING to work with! He was very courteous,  professional,  and responsive. The entire team worked together to get us approved and closed on time. Jimmy kept us updated on progress every step of the way. I would definitely use 1st Family Mortgage Company again in the future or refer them to friends and family.

name: Ryan Guidry
text: Enjoyed working with Diane and 1st Family Mortgage Company to refinance my home.  Very easy process and Diane answered all my questions along the way.  I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to refinance their home.

name: Willy Oliveira
text: First Family is awesome!!! Such an easy experience!

name: Jeffery Kresha
text: Communication was quick, easy and straight forward. Got a great rate. went from 4.5 to 2.8 saved over $100,000.00

name: Dewan Davis
text: I had a great experience with 1st Family Mortgage. I lowered my monthly payments lowered the number of years on my loan and got a little money back. The process was simple and easy and my loan agent Jimmy was cool as a fan. I definitely recommend for anybody looking to save a little money  and interest on their mortgage.

name: Chad Ryan
text: 1st Family Mortgage was amazing! I had just an ok experience refinancing a couple years ago, and I thought I would try a different company this time around.  1FMC was quick, thorough and extremely accessible through the whole process.  From the first time I called until my closing day, the process only took two weeks. I can’t say enough good things about 1FMC.  If I need to refinance again or get a new mortgage, they are my go to company from now on.

name: Rich Brassell
text: I contacted 1st Family Mortgage to move from a 30-year loan with 27 years of payments remaining to a 15-year loan.  All of my questions were answered promptly, and communication was top notch.   My expectations for all aspects of the process were not only met but exceeded.

name: Diana Rios
text: Closing that should have taken 30-45 days took 6mths.  Poor communication with follow through.  Still waiting on cash out check. I would never recommend company.  Poor external customer service.  Also, looks like poor internal customer service because they didn't inform notary that they were cancelling her visit to my house and she wasn't aware until she was calling me to confirm that I was home that I told her she couldn't be the one to do the closing that it had to be an attorney.  Someone didn't know the CT laws apparently.  She sounded just as upset at not being notified.  That showed me their inconsistency with customer  service.

name: Nick Aldis
text: Great people to deal with; they communicate clearly and they understand how stressful buying a house can be and feel like a teammate through the whole thing.

name: Andrew Davis
text: David Digesu at 1st Family Mortgage is 5-star. He knows his products, the industry and the best options for a client. He's an advocate for the homeowner, works hard and has great customer service. I'd recommend him to any friend or family member purchasing a home!

name: Mike Tracy
text: Give this company a chance to earn your business and I think you’ll be glad you did.

name: Dirk Simpson
text: The refi process with Derek was SO easy and hassle-free! 90% of it was handled via email or txt and the only complications were due to the number of other loans they were handling due to the historic low rates.  1st Family has helped me save nearly $100k on my mortgage and allowed me too pay off numerous other credit cards which who knows how much that will have saved me in the long-run!

name: Andrew Lacy
text: First Family Mortgage was great. I took 6 years off my loan and still have a lower payment than before! Derek was helpful and just a text away with any questions. Definitely recommend.

name: Jordan Mayton
text: Conrad and his team are great. We worked with Jimmy on a refinance. He got us a great rate and we didn’t even have to get an appraisal! Great job 1FMC!

name: Casey Sasser

name: Eddie L
text:
Told me I was qualified for a USDA loan with no money down.  Then told me I wasn't. Kept me on the phone for an hour trying to calculate what a payment would be.  Told me to get a cash advance for $2000 on a credit card, or go get another loan for $2000, to get enough of a down payment for a FHA loan.  Almost sounded like the person I was talking to wanted to get spiffed for selling that particular product and wasn't interested in helping me with anything else.

Then after an hour on the phone, told me "you'll have to get this collections dispute removed before we can do anything at all."

And this is after they called me an hour late because the original consultant that was supposed to call me never did.

I decided to give them a shot because of good reviews and because I'm a fan of Conrad's podcasts, but this was nothing but frustration.

name: Magen Smith
text: My husband and I just purchased our first home with 1st family mortgage.  We worked with Carlos Carter and he was amazing. He made sure to explain everything to us at our first appointment and make sure we understood. He was patient and answered all of my questions (sometimes 2 or 3 times). I was overwhelmed starting the process but he made it so simple amd smooth. I would recommend Carlos and 1st family mortgage to anyone looking to purchase!

name: Mr. Romer
text: Good experience.  Made it possible to do everything without leaving home.  Which is important right now.  Social Distancing.

name: Aaron Penton
text: Lets start from the beginning. I first contacted David Digesu on 2/13/2020 inquiring about a 15 year refi and on or around 3/3/2020 we formally began the process. Then from 3/13/2020 to 4/5/2020 we did not receive any communication or status update from David or 1FMC, despite our multiple emails and phone calls to both David’s cell and the 1FMC office. During this time gap, on 3/27/2020, Sean Hollis performed our appraisal. Finally on April 5, David contacted us, apologized for going AWOL and provided the appraisal.  Sean’s report appraised our home at around $25K below our 2017 purchase price while acknowledging in his report that our neighborhood "is showing moderate growth with stable to increasing property values”. We, of course, found Sean’s appraisal unacceptable and David suggested we request a reconsideration, which we immediately agreed to do. I think David requested the reconsideration, but I really don’t know because from 4/5/2020 to 5/1/2020 (26 days if you’re keeping count) we did not receive any kind of real update. David’s replies were more of a “kick the can” approach. Finally on 5/1/2020, completely frustrated, I emailed David asking for a status and stating that we either needed to move forward or cut bait and go somewhere else. On 5/6/2020, to my utter shock and disbelief, David replied that we should go to a different mortgage company because he had "tried everything he could think of". Completely incensed at this point and having already spent $500 for the appraisal, I replied to David on 5/7/2020 at 8:45am that walking away at this point was unacceptable. I asked David to send me the documentation of both the formal request for reconsideration that was filed and the formal response from AMS denying our reconsideration because I was going to file formal complaint to the Alabama Real Estate Appraisers Board. Amazingly, at 5:31pm of that same day, we received an email from Casey Brannon of 1FMC containing our new appraisal with an updated value. We then had to resign documents but finally on 5/26/2020, Casey emailed me stating that our loan was clear to close and the title company had an opening on Monday 6/1/2020 @ 3:30pm. The following evening I replied to Casey confirming that this date and time would work. On 6/1/2020 at 3:15pm we arrived at the title company’s office and sat in their waiting area for over 30 minutes when the closing attorney came around the corner to tell us that we would not be closing. She had just received an email from 1FMC stating that the closing documents were not ready. Once again, David and no one from 1FMC contacted me or my wife to let us know what was going on. We had left work early that day to make the appointment 1FMC offered us and then would once again have to take off early later that week to close on Friday 6/5/2020 at 4pm. In summary, I first contacted David on 2/13/2020, on or around 3/3/2020 we formally began the process, and did not close until 6/5/2020 at no fault of our own. Depending on which start date you choose, that’s between 94 and 113 days to close! That is ridiculous and unacceptable! Our entire experience with David and 1FMC was unprofessional and lacked any regard or empathy for our well-being. There's is no way I could, would or will ever refer anyone to 1FMC.

name: Jessica Hart
text: My husband and I had an excellent experience with First Family Mortgage. We had the pleasure of working with Jerome Fischer. We were impressed with how fast we were able to close on our home. We began working with Jerome in January of this year. My husband and I figured that it would take months for us to find and close on a home but it only took us about a month and a half.  He is so awesome! He made sure that my husband and I would get the best deal in finding the perfect loan for our beautiful new home. He is very patient, answers all questions in a timely manner, and ensured that all of our paper work was processed fine. Overall, we give him five stars. For anyone wanting to talk about home loans, come talk to Jerome. He won't disappoint. He has made our home buying process as smooth as possible and now me and my family are enjoying our beautiful new home.

Thank you Carlos!

Sonny Kirk

name: Shala Holloway
text: Ron Rice with First Family Mortgage made the entire process simple and FAST!

name: Bradley Capps
text: Great place to do business with, Carlos is very knowledgeable and really helpful when it comes to understanding what is going on, which is very helpful considering I'm a first time buyer and don't understand all the processes and what's supposed to be done. Overall a great experience working with everyone involved at 1st Family Mortgage.

name: Calvin Parker
text: I went through my refinance experience with the assistance of Jason Norton. His professionalism was exceptional and I would recommend him to anyone. Thank you 1st Family for this great experience!

name: Maria Nolen
text: Had a horrible time with this company it took three times for closing never calling ahead for information and material needed waiting till last minute and then it was late at that also I contacted the company by phone three times never returning any of my calls I wouldn't recommend this company for closing again

name: Jeremy Henderson
text: If you love for everyone to know your business this is the place to go. Now the loan process went very well, it was afterwards that went to pot. We were asked several times if we wanted our information used in the advertisements to which we said no each and every time. I am the type person that does not like anyone knowing my business. Well after we closed on our loan I even called and requested to speak to Conrad Thompson on how well pleased that I was with his employees to which I was redirected right away. He is where it went downhill fast. A week went by and I had a friend text me on a Tuesday asking if I went to 1st FM and refinanced that he heard it on the radio. Wednesday morning my wife called and wanted to know why our names were on the radio when we SPECIFICALLY said the we did not want our names on any advertisements, they apologized and said that the advertising people must have made a mistake and that it would be removed immediately. Later that day I received a call from the two people that we dealt with in the loan process apologizing about the mishap. Friday morning I was on my way to work and I heard the commercial with our name in it so I called them immediately wanting to know why it was still on after they promised me that it would not be. The lady told me that Sunday would definitely be the pulled then I then requested to want to talk to Conrad Thompson whom they said was not there and I left my number for him to return my call which he did not. Well Tuesday rolls around and low and behold my wife calls me and says that it is STILL on the radio! By now I am furious because I have been repeatedly lied to. I call back up there and get the same story that it shouldn't be on there so I request again to talk to Mr. Thompson and have the same results. So in conclusion if you love for everyone around the country to know your business,  then definitely contact 1st Family Mortgage! If you want your business to be more discreet you may want to look elsewhere. I regularly check my credit report to see if anything else was compromised since they dropped the ball on my opting out of wanting my information for advertisement. Only time will tell.

name: Shannon Fischer
text: My husband and I have a unique refi situation... which most people do these days. We didnt hide that from them. Our first appt with them didnt go well. Felt like we wasted our time. The guy insulted my husband making a joke about him being injured while in the Army. We eventually asked to have our application given to another person there. From the start it didnt go well. I asked that they speak with me and not bother my husband at work. She initially called him. It was one thing after another and took 2 months for them to finally admit they couldnt help us. I asked to speak with a manager. Boss. Owner. Something. Anything and no one ever called to speak with me. I wouldnt reccomend them to anyone.

name: Andrew Brengman
text: Thank you Tim and Conrad rock stars of the lending business.  We needed to consolidate an old credit card and they helped us get it done.  No hoops to jump through, just straight forward.  Thank you.

name: Nicholas Yount
text: Carlos Carter was a pleasure to work with!  His knowledge, hard work ethic, and ability made my first time home buying experience a walk in the park!

We cut our interest rate in half & significantly lowered our payment. I would recommend them to anyone looking to better themselves on their mortgage payments. R. Smith

I will say in reguards to this,Conrad did call me personally and tried to take care of the matter 100%.Conrad himself is a man of integrity and keeps his word.

The lady (mortgage specialist ?) that called back later to discuss home loan was the most rude and disrespectful person I've ever dealt with. I would never talk to a human being the way she talked to me. I don't need to name her because she knows who she is. I'll pray for you.
Don't believe any of their ads, radio ads or commercials, it's all fake.

resp.text:
I am appalled that you were treated so poorly. We strive to give every customer a perfect experience. Please call me directly at 256-382-7670 concerning your experience so that I can take corrective action and personally apologize.

-Susie Brock

name: Brandon Ogden
text: Very high in closing fee costs. Do not go with 1st Family without shopping around and comparing Good Faith Estimates. It was my first time buying a house and nearly paid $4,000 more in closing fees than with another mortgage company.

name: Dharini Patel
text: I called them. Their front desk have no clue. Just a waste of time

name: Joyce Coleman
text: My husband and I had the pleasure of working with Megan Bissell.  We felt like we were her own clients because we were constantly updated and in contact.  She helped us refinance our home and we are now paying about $250.00 per month less and we will have the house paid in full in 10 years, if not sooner.  Thank you Megan, you did a wonderful job and kept me calm when things got crazy.  With my husband being out of town for business, Megan worked double time to get get all information needed while he was out of town.  I will hopefully be closing the lst of next week and Megan was able to arrange for my husband to be in Florida and myself in Madison and still get the closing done on time.  Thank you

name: Anna King
text: My fiancé and I did not have a positive experience with First Family Mortgage. We were very understanding of how time consuming and pressing the process of buying a house can be. Our closing date kept being rescheduled, which we knew was typical. However, during this process, Josh Butler would NOT answer or return our calls. He is not a respectful or professional mortgage lender. It was obvious that he continued to "drop the ball" on our file. It seemed as though he was never in his office. He is the only one at the company that has a personal assistant. Why? Because he cannot get any work done on his own. It does not look good when someone has to do the work for him. It did not help when we would call to speak to the owners of First Family Mortgage, such as Conrad Thompson, because him and Josh Butler were friends. Neither one of them have an idea of how to treat a concerned customer. They were very careless. I have never been acquainted with someone that has MY business that treats their customer so VERY rudely. No matter the positive reviews you see, please, do not give First Family Mortgage your business. Unlike my fiancé and I, do not fall for the annoying voice on the radio: "This is Conrad Thompson with First Family Mortgage..." They will screw you over.

name: Adriane Ketelsen
text: I recently decided to FINALLY call 1FMC after hearing the ads on the radio for months.  Not only did the process go by really fast but I also had the pleasure of working with Jim Kelly.  He was very fast to respond to any questions I had and made sure we closed by the end of the month.  I couldn't be happier that I made the call to 1FMC.  I was able to lower my monthly payment and pay off my car as well as 2 credit cards from the money I received back.  They did an amazing job making sure I was taken care of.

name: Jim Kelly
text:
I have been wanting to refinance my house for a few years now and didn't know how to go about doing that.  I heard the ads on the radio and seen the commercials on TV and decided to call.  I talked to Kayla McNatt and she helped me with everything I needed.  Kept me informed on what was going on all the way to the end.  I payed off a student loan that was taking forever to pay off and cut 5 years off my loan.

Thanks Kayla for all the help and information.

name: Linda Ragan
text: Jason was absolutely great, very good experience, Helped my family so much. Thank You Jason , you are awesome.

name: DrNass Manraga
text: First, let me say that members of the staff were amazing!! My husband and I had credit card debt that was way out of hand, embarrassing actually. We contacted Larry and he fully explained our options; he never once looked down on us like some finance places do (i.e. banks). We took advantage of a 'cash-out' refinance and were able to close in less than a month. We paid off all our credit card debt and kept our house payment about the same (about $20 less a month). So, YES! I would recommend 1st Family Mortgage to anyone that needs to refinance. One thing to remember though, it is a mortgage, we were blessed to close so quickly but sometimes a mortgage may take a little longer to close.

name: billie jo collins
text: Conrad Thompson at first family constantly checked my credit while I delt with him, almost 30 times in 3 months, driving down my credit score. I found this out by opening my one credit monitoring account. He was supposed to be helping me repair MY credit, instead he was lowering my score. I was a first time home buyer, and when I questioned he about it he denied it although I could clearly see  on life lock that every time I called him , he would so a hard pull on my credit and my score would drop a few points. The lender   I work with after him, would do a soft pulland,  not affect my score. I since been informed that the lower score a lender can get approved the bigger their bonus. :-(

name: Marty Barrett
text: I was referred to Tracy Flesch at First Family Mortgage.  I did an FHA Streamline Refinance Loan and saved over $450.00 a  month.  Tracy made the process simple and easy and I would HIGHLY recommend Tracy and First Family Mortgage to anyone!

name: Your Business
text: Good people, pleasant to work with, fair price and great service! Highly recommend!!

name: Thomas Austin
text: Fast, professional and honest. Tracy was helpful and informative at every step of the process, and I was able to drop my monthly payments by over $500 per month.

name: Mickale Bigham
text: Do not waste your time with this company!!! They will get you all set up for a mortgage loan and then never call you back.

name: Tracy Galliher
text: We just bought a house and could not have done it without Sherry Spurlin!! She was wonderful and worked her tail off to get it done. I have told many other people looking to buy a house to contact Sherry Spurlin. Thank you Sherry for all of your hard work!!!

name: Alan Green
text: Justin Harris did a great job in lowering the term, interest rate, and monthly payment of our old mortgage. Everything went very smoothly.

name: veronica ray
text: Kristi Nelson forest gives the best customer service!

name: Jack Tramiel
text: Conrad and his staff are the best!!!!

name: Bill Shields
text:
I had a terrific experience with David Robinson at the Florence Office. The customer service was great. David was very professional and very prompt with correspondance. He was very imformative and addressed all of my questions and concerns.
Will use in future and will reccommend to family and friends. It was a pleasure doing business with 1st Family and David Robinson.

name: Karla Neville
text: I'm certainly NOT new  in mortgage transactions. Verbal discussions were not at all consistent with locked in values. The communications were minimal and poor. Overall, for the truly critical info, I was left in the dark . Within one week of disclosing all personal info, I immediately started recieving several offers from other loan offers (in other words, they sold my private info). I challenged the loan officer that they did not have my best interest and the response I got was I was recieving xx amount of dollars in monthly savings. Now they have sold my mortgage to some no known second rate  company that can't even line up the correct name to the loan number. Oh joys! My advise, go with a refinance or finace with a credit union. I'm regret the transition.

name: Chris Browning
text: Great place to save money on refi and best rate mortgages!

name: Christy Fowler
text: The worst experience I've ever had to deal with. I would not recommend them to anyone. Just awful.

name: Keith Wallace
text: Great service and a great bunch of people. Jim Kelly helped me every step of the way!

name: Amy Hancock
text: Update on our CRAPPY situation with 1st Family Mortgage. We had decided to go with another company. The new company was a dream to work with. We were waiting on the approval from FHA...well to no surprise our appraisal we had done with 1st Family was invalid. FHA would not accept the appraisal because there was some discrepancies. Yet again they have screwed me over. I wrote Conrad and said I wanted to talk to him. I received a call from his vice president. He said they wanted to make it right and presented me with two options. Basically one reimbursed us for some stuff we had to have done and the other was a lower rate. We had decided to go with one of their options. I call the vice president Monday morning and well those are all off the table. He apparently had no business in giving me any offers because Conrad did not approve those. First of all if you are doing business with a customer you need to have all your numbers right and if you don't have the  authority to give me options then don't call. Conrad should have been the one to call. Each time we would talk to them the cash back we were suppose to get back was $1000 less. I understand when you give me numbers they will be different from a few hundred dollars but several $1000. You need to get your crap together before you approach a customer to make it right. We decided not to sign with them because frankly I wouldn't feel great about signing with them. I would have felt it would have been a deal with the devil. I have asked them to at least refund me my appraisal since apparently their appraiser can't do their job right. They have yet to respond. Do not use these guys! You can find lower rates and definitely closing costs!  If for some reason you do go with them. Use a different appraiser and do not use who they recommend. I am sure their are some kick backs going on there. Do not use their termite either! Do research you might not need a termite if you are doing a refinance. We royally got screwed over from 1st Family and I hope no one else suffers the financial costs we have. They are not worth your time or money!

name: Aaron Dawson
text: My family and I were looking for a way to lower our monthly outgo, lessen the number of years on our mortgage and strectch our finances in these difficult times.  Jeff Gurley and the 1st Family team did a fantastic job of making the process as easy as possible.  If and when I have financial needs inthe future, this is where I will go.

name: Joshua Hill
text:
Refinanced our home into a FHA Streamline with FFM. Matt Braye did an excellent job presenting us options and helping us to find the best option for us. Not only did we lower our interest rate by half, we also dropped our payment significantly.

If you are buying or refinancing, call FFM first and be sure and ask for Matt. He will take great care of you!

name: Beri Fraley
text:
Kyla McNatt (Athens office) contacted me about refinancing my current VA mortgage. I was on a very busy work schedule, but Kayla was able to work with me and get all the paperwork completed without coming into the office until the closing date. The whole refi process was completely painless - I did not appreciate how easy this was until I heard stories of other friends going through a painful process with other mortgage companies.
I have used 1st Family Mortgage twice now (Huntsville and Athens offices) and had a very positive experience - they got a great rate for me and saved me money both times.
Simon Weesner (now runs the Athens office) is very knowledgeable and handled my first refi. Simon and his staff maintained excellent communications with me during the whole process so there were no surprises at closing. The whole process both times was seamless and the entire staff at both offices was courteous and efficient.

name: Brian Ivey
text:
When rates dipped low, I decided it was time to start looking for a house. By mistake, I called a finance company other than 1FMC to get the ball rolling for a pre-approval. This other finance company would take days to return my calls which made me believe if they will not help me on a pre-approval, then they sure will not help when I actually have a loan.
I kept hearing ads on various radio stations for 1FMC so I decided to give them a call. Within a very short time, I received a call from Kayla. She was extremely friendly and helpful, just the opposite of my first loan attempt. I spoke briefly with Kayla explaining the purpose of the needed loan and she went to work. Kayla kept me informed throughout the entire process at what was going on and what I needed to do. With the help of Kayla, this was a very painless process.
From my experience, don't waste your time calling other finance companies. Call 1FMC now!

name: Greg Mitchell
text: 1FMC was just like the "Boss" described on the radio...fast, easy, and painless!  The rates fell enough that I refianced twice in as many years.  T.J. Byrne handled both and did a great job.  I'll re-fi with 1FMC tomorrow if the rates drop again!  Give them a try!

name: Greg Ligon
text: Simon Weesner at First Family was a God send to help me get my mortgage! Be sure to call him up if you ever need a helping hand.

name: Scott Morse
text: Christian, Larry and Holly were my contacts at First Family Mortgage and I could rave about each one of them for paragraphs. They were patient, kind, attentive and informative. I would recommend first family mortgage for anyone trying to consolidate debt, refinance, or buy a home.

name: Dwayne Riner
text: We had a great experience with First Family Mortgage. We had explored refinancing a couple of years ago, but had a terrible experience with another lender and quit. First Family was a completely different experience. Eric stayed in communication the whole time and I had lots of help from the First Family staff. Everyone is friendly and works hard to help you. I’m so glad I heard about Save with Conrad on the podcast and took the time to call. They now only saved us thousands, but now our family is on the right track to achieving our financial goals. It was true a blessing!

name: Anna Catanzaro
text: I received Reliant Mortgage’s contact as a recommendation through a friend and could not have been happier. They were more than happy to answer all my questions and concerns that i did have given this was my first home purchase. They secured me a great rate and followed up throughout the whole process to ensure everything went smoothly. I am more than happy to recommend their services to all my friends and family and will definitely use their services again in the future.

name: Elizabeth Thomas
text: I wish to thank Travis and Scott for the amazing work they did to facilitate my recent move. They were always available when I need to talk to them. They responded with patience kindness and professionalism to all my questions. I will be definitely recommending Reliant Mortgage to others! Great Job guys

name: Stephen Mackay
text: As a first time home buyer, I had a lot of questions. Reliant Mortgage specialists David and Joshua were extremely patient and provided me with detailed information in a way that made sense. And they also provided me with options to help me make decisions that i was comfortable with. Always happy to recommend them in any mortgage making decision.

name: Jessica Paluch
text: Hi Guys! Well thanks to your hard bargaining, I'm now a proud owner of my family home! I certainly appreciate all your hard work and patience on my behalf. All the best! Highly recommend Ciara for all your mortgage issues

name: Nika Wetzler
text: If you need mortgage financing for a home i have no hesitation in recommending Reliant Mortgage. They are the best I have ever used. They touch all the bases for a smooth financing or refinancing!

name: Roger Hershberger
text: Reliant Mortgage guys got us an amazing rate to refinance our mortgage and then at the last moment were able to get us an even better rate! Thanks for the great service and for helping us along the way. They were always there to answer all of our questions.

name: Nicholas Poché
text: Ki secured my first mortgage on my first home purchase.  I shopped several brokers and immediately knew I would go with Ki the first time I talked to him.  He's friendly, straight forward (read: no BS), speaks in laymen's terms so the client understands everything, advocates for your best interests, and is 100% responsive and accessible.  I never waited longer than an hour for a reply text, call, or email from Ki, regardless of the time of day.  I have an incredibly high standard of service and Ki exceeded my expectations.  I cannot recommend him enough, especially if you want someone to patiently walk you through the first-time buyer process. Thank you, Ki, for your professionalism and assistance.  I was in great hands with you.

name: jeorde meaner
text: As a first time buyer, I was very anxious about who to choose for a mortgage company. After asking around, I only heard good things about this bunch. I'm so glad I took the advice given to me by friends and coworkers; From the minute I contacted them to the minute we got the keys to our new home in hand (and even after that when questions arose), Reliant staff were supportive, knowledgeable, and extremely helpful. Working with Ki, Will and David was easy, simple, and transparent the whole time. The staff were always courteous and friendly, and always went much further than I was expecting them to (there was even a point when they were on vacation but continued to work on our file), and they always had a sense of urgency to get it done and get it done right. Hands down, will be using this company for our next move. Thanks again!

name: Today's Resumes
text: I have purchased and refinanced multiple homes throughout the last decade, and have just closed on a home with with Ki Gillispie through Reliant Mortgage.  I have never dealt with how easy the mortgage process can be!  I'm not sure exactly what they do differently, but they gained me as a client and friend for life!  Thanks again Ki!  You handled everything tremendously!!!

name: Jessica Parker
text: Ki was very professional through the whole home buying process. He was always available to talk and very polite. I'm so happy to be in my new home an I owe Ki all the thanks!

name: James Michelli
text: I worked with Ki Gillespie on our mortgage. I’ve had several mortgages in the past and I must say Ki was the best person I’ve ever worked with. My situation was not easy as I had just been divorced, had another house in my name, and was about to get remarried. He worked hard to overcome ever single obstacle in our way. Not only did he do it, but he did it with a great attitude. Went above and beyond as far as contacting my attorney, my ex wife, even helped with a bill of sale to sell my truck. I would not use anyone else ever when looking for a mortgage. I am a client for life!! Thanks Ki for everything

name: kumasi mants
text:
Ki is awesome. He helped us through every step of the mortgage loan process. He made calls tirelessly to repair issues with previous creditors. He resolved loose ends that would have caused most lenders to disqualify our loan. Ki was professional, personable, and precise. He kept us reassured that we were going to be homeowners. He advocated for us like a lawyer in the court room. He spoke to us like he had known us all his life, which also allowed him the ability pick up on clues on how to provide the best mortgage services for our family.  Ki also surrounds himself with other highly motivated people that gave our loan the diligence it deserved. At every point in the loan he educated us on the product and process so we would be confident and clear of what was going to happen.

When anyone ask us who we would recommend when obtaining a mortgage, the answer is Ki Gillespie and Reliant Mortgage.

Thank you sincerely,
Kumasi Mants

name: Gabriela Crespo Gutierrez
text: Ki was very helpful in buying a new home. We had a few lenders before we met Ki, not give us the time of day. That wasn’t the case with him. Very informative and held our hands through the whole proces. We have our own home now thanks to him!

name: Kristie Stout
text: I've used services of Reliant Mortgage for my last two mortgages and would not hesitate to use them again or continue to refer them to friends and family. Not only are they a pleasure to work with their attention to detail is second to none.

name: Teila Keys
text: I am very impressed with Ki. He has a wealth of knowledge, but portrays a down-to-earth character.   I’m always comfortable asking any questions and his replies are always immediate. Highly recommended.

name: Lenny Saucier
text: I never did a refi before. It's was so easy i was skeptical that it was actually happening. Ki kept me up to date both by text and email on all items i needed and what the status was. Before you know it...boom.. papers signed.

name: Raymond Courtois
text: Guys you are fantastic at what you do, we appreciate your help very much. We will be sure to send any business your way that we can.

His team was great, they handled EVERYTHING and all I had to do is what they told me…”sit back, relax, and just get us the documents we need while we overcome all obstacles.”  Thank you all, I believe in magic!

name: Amanda Weld

name: Melisa Dalbey
text: Thanks guys.it all went well. Will certainly pass along your name if anyone we know is looking for a mortgage.

Thank you,  thank you!!! 😊

text: Awesome service and great job.  Yes I will use them again.

name: Drew Cottrell
text: They've got the money for your classes

name: Christy Bailey
text: Worst Navy Federal location period. Zero sense of urgency, lazy and slow. Plan 2 hours of your day if you need to speak to a customer service representative and definitely don't go near lunch time or you will be waiting for hours.

name: Shahari Pierce
text: The services provided are wonderful. The employees are professional, friendly and very helpful to your needs. The major issue I have with this particular branch, is the parking and drive through area.The layout is not large enough or constructed in a way that makes sense. It's extremely inconvenient to park/and or get into line to do drive through services. The wait time is usually around 20-30 mins. If you are parked in the back, it takes sometimes 6 minutes to get out, and there's little driving space to do so. If they address these particular issues, they will have a much higher rating.

name: Kenyotta Davis
text: Firstly I love navy federal there is no better bank ! But I seriously need you all to consider building another location in Montgomery on a bigger lot. I have been trying to come here since last 4 days each time being the same outcome. Currently waiting I know I’ll be late to work , but for this 2021 honeys I need you all to consider a second location . At least set up safe ATM locations around town that are navy federal .

name: Dave Gorman
text: NFCU overall is a great place to bank and has the best rates on loans. This branch though is an absolute disaster. The parking lot is a trap due to the configuration of the drive through lanes so it takes forever to get in or out. Drive through service is very slow.

name: I AM SHAN
text: It will be better if the parking lot was bigger. Sometimes I have to park out on the side of the road and ask over to the ATM. & (sometimes) when I can get  into the parking lot I get blocked in by other cars, and can’t get out until whenever. Other than that everything else is great.

name: Haley Duncan
text: Love Navy Fed and have a had great experience. We’re visiting from out of town and stopped to deposit at this location — they don’t use deposit slips in the drive-thru.... but they will send out a piece of paper for you. Odd and annoying, but still received wonderful and friendly service.

name: Calvin. Chance
text: I went online to find out the closing time which is 5:30. I show up and the lobby window states new hours are 4:30 but drive through is open. So I waited 30 minutes for the teller to say they need a thumbprint to cash a check, please come back tomorrow. Why couldn’t I have done a thumbprint at the drive through? I’ve done them before! What a crock!!

text: Great banking, the location drive thru , and parking is horrible. Expect to wait, the walk in was not optional.

name: Jovan
text: Customer service is awesome! Everyone is very knowledgeable and it seems like they want to help you! I would recommend the branch to anyone!

name: Ja’Anna Pierce
text: I went in there yesterday & I loved everything about it. It usually hate going in banks to open accounts due to the long wait time & lack of customer service. But Anthony Thornton was very nice, funny, & professional. He made my day. So happy I am apart of the navy federal family!

name: Peyton Prausa
text:
I was having a very, very bad day. I'm traveling, and I lost my debit card so I had to drive an hour to get to the nearest branch & use literally the only cash I had (3 whole dollars) just to get enough gas to make it to the bank. When I got there I realized I left my military ID an hour away where I'm staying. I had no gas, no money, and no ID so I was understandably very stressed when they told me I needed my ID to get a replacement.
The manager of the bank made an exception though, and was the kindest lady I have ever met in my entire life. She very quickly helped me out and I now have a new card. The service is incredible and I'm very thankful.

name: Iconic Living
text: Always great customer service and always knowledgeable for my all banking questions!!👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾

name: D R

text: closed without notice

Great bank but drive through is unbelievably slow!!!!! 20 minutes overall waiting, and when I pulled up just one car in front of me! Guess Wells Fargo just got another customer!!!!

Btw this isnt the first time, happens Every time I come through their drive thru!

text: There is not too much to say other than, this is a wonderful bank. I've enjoyed the three years that I've been banking with navy federal. NFCU gets things done and when there's a suspicious matter with your card you're notified immediately and reimbursed if something like fraud occurs. To top it off you get a certain amount of cashier checks free which is wonderful because some other local banks charge a fee that I would find to be unnecessary if I am a member. NFCU is extremely reliable and I will continue to bank with them.

name: Talia Smith
text: EVERY single time I call or go in i have spectacular customer service.  I have other accounts,  mainly credit unions as well,  but Navy Federal by far is the best.

name: David Edwards
text: If you do any mobile banking, go elsewhere. They continually "update" their system which then blocks your access to the app. The only way to regain access is to go through customer service. The number listed on their app and website can't be reached, so you have to Google your local location which then goes to the customer service department. Stay on hold there for 10 minutes, a recording tells you your call is important and your estimated wait time is 8 minutes 59 seconds. Ten minutes later, the same message about your call being important comes on, but now your wait time is 8 minutes 55 seconds. Seriously, go to Alabama Credit Union. At least their stuff works and they know how to answer a phone.

resp.text: Hi David, Centennial Bank strives to provide excellent service to our customers. We have received your complaint and acknowledge your frustration with the updates to Mobile Banking. We want to assure you that we will take the opportunity to address your concerns within the Bank. We offer our sincere apology. We know you have choices and appreciate you choosing Centennial Bank. Feel free to contact us with any further concerns at https://www.my100bank.com/#get-in-touch.

text: After trying with two other mortgage companies, First Federal was the first to actually help us finance our first home. resp.text: Thank you we are glad we could go on the first home buying journey with you!

name: Omar Sims
text:
I recently worked with KC Haririan at First Federal Bank in purchasing a new house.  As my mortgage broker, KC was efficient, thorough, knowledgeable, and dependable. Without a doubt, KC is an expert in mortgage financing, the purchasing process of buying a house, and in anticipating potential barriers to overcome in the process.

KC was very proactive through my purchasing/financing experience. He followed up with me via phone or email quickly without delay, he kept the process going, and stayed in constant communication with my realtor. His efficiency is exemplified in his ability to close on my house within 30 days of me winning the bid on the house.

Above all, KC is transparent and trustworthy. He is quite the professional and I will be using him and First Federal Mortgage again for my future buying experiences as well. KC represented himself and First Federal Mortgage in a remarkable fashion.

I also had the opportunity of working with KC's assistant, Haley Roscoe. Haley was equally responsive and facilitated attention to details. Anytime additional documentation was needed (or if I needed to provide additional documentation to First Federal) Haley reviewed and submitted documentation without delay. She also anticipated potential barriers and provided solutions to keep the buying/financing process going. It was truly a pleasure working with Haley and she enhanced my experience with First Federal.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We always try and do our best to make the mortgage process as quick and simple as possible! It was our pleasure to work with you too!

name: Rebecca Winslett
text: We used Gloria Jackson with First Federal, and she was very knowledgeable in guiding us through our second home purchase. She was always willing to answer our questions, via email or phone, even when she was not in the office. She followed through even after the closing was complete, and we would absolutely recommend her to anyone looking for a home mortgage lender.

resp.text: Thank you!

text: KC Haririan and his team at First Federal did a fantastic job at handling the financing of our new home. They were professional and prompt during the entire process. I highly recommend them.

text: Wesly is a local mortgage professional, who together with the rest of his team, provides a better experience when getting a mortgage. Wesly has a reputation for great customer service and being able to answer questions while making the process hassle free. Wesly helps his clients get low rates, and to find the right mortgage product whether they are a first-time buyer, moving from one home to another, or even if they are an investor. Wesly works with veterans and offers VA mortgages, and has low down payment options like FHA loans and other loans that might help you buy a home. If you're refinancing, be sure to talk to Wesly first so he can run the numbers and give you great advice. If you need a mortgage in Alabama, Georgia, or Florida, you've got to talk to Wesly!

resp.text:
Our Member Contact Center wants to follow up to be sure we don't miss any other calls and would appreciate your help. Will you send an email to Service@NavigatorCU.org and include the phone number(s) you use when calling our 800-344-3281 number?

We really appreciate the positive review, and we also appreciate your feedback about your experience with our Member Contact Center. resp.text: Thanks so much, Ryan! Navigator offers comprehensive banking services, and we're here to help in any way we can. Our Save'N Up debit card savings program is especially popular, as it gives Members the chance to save, earn high interest and receive matching funds up to $300 per year. Of course, terms and conditions apply, but it's very easy to add to our free checking account. Give us a call, visit navigatorcu.org or come by any Branch to learn more. :)

text: We have been members for 10+ years. Over the last decade we have had the sincere privilege of working with Patricia Mink, the Branch Manager at the Priceville branch, on many transactions. name: Jennifer Turney
text: They have horrible customer service. Every month, it is like pulling teeth to get them to actually take a payment on an auto loan. There is always something. This month, they’re not allowed to speak with me about my husband’s auto loan. We have given written permission several times, not to mention, this isn’t a problem each month. I have spoken to other representatives about the account before. However, this month it was a problem. I know our payment amount, however, the rep would not confirm that the amount I gave was correct. I also asked if we were on a paperless billing cycle with them since we did not receive a statement this month and she refused to answer. When questioned, she stated her department can’t speak to me about the account but other departments can. Seriously?? This is just one of the many reasons I hate making this call every month. We also have to pay $10 for them to take our payment over the phone. We refuse to mail a check because they will “lose it” and we will be charged more fees. We are not close to a branch and can’t make it to a drive thru without being inconvenienced. So, we pay them to take our money each month. Do yourself a favor and use another bank for your auto loan or any other banking needs.

resp.text:
Thank you for reaching out, Jennifer. We would like to apologize that your experience has not been up to our Guardian standards, and hope we can speak with you further about this.

An alternative to paying your loan payment over the phone is using Guardian's Free Mobile App to make a loan payment. Visit  http://bit.ly/GuardianDigitalSolutions for more information, or feel free to reach out to our team at 334-244-9999 to speak with one of our team members about this.

Thank you for allowing us to serve you.
