name: Rodney Banks
text: Your branch stole my money now i don't know how me and my son going to eat. 😥

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out, Rodney. We apologize for the issues you are having with your account and our team will be happy to talk with you further about this. Please reach out to us at 334-244-9999, and ask for our Resolutions Supervisor, Terrie. Thank you for allowing us to serve you.

name: Herbert Smith
text: Been a member since they were in a trailer on national guard headquarters, treated like nothing. A ten day hold on my check to bury my son. I just charged the final expenses on my credit card.

resp.text: Mr. Smith we are terribly sorry to hear about your experience and will investigate accordingly. Thank you for your membership, we will be contacting you soon.

name: Chris Batchelor
text: Slowest drive thru ever 30 mins to cash a check

resp.text: Chris, we are sorry to hear you had a difficult experience in our drive-through. Please feel free to reach out to us at 334-244-9999 to discuss how we can better serve you!

name: Barry Grubbs
text: There is some type of fraudulent stuff going on with this bank. I've had an account with this bank for quite sometime and trusted everything was kosher, all of the sudden "bam" I started getting insufficient fund charges every time I used my card. I mean they were stealing money from me. I went in multiple times in a months period for them to refund the fees and not one time did they refund all the fees. Usually just a portion of them. I would recommend anyone using this bank to watch their account very close. I took all my money out and went elsewhere. Tried to close the account and they told me no I couldn't because I have a vehicle loan. I mean isn't the loan an account? Why do I have to have a checking or savings account? This bank is terrible and I don't recommend it to anyone

resp.text: We are sorry to hear your experience with Guardian was less than amazing. We work hard to ensure all of our member's needs are met and they come first on all fronts. We will be in touch soon to walk through your Guardian experience and do everything we can to make it right. We thank you for thinking of Guardian and  hope you enjoy your weekend. Thank you.

name: Tyler McCurdy
text: This branch is Wonderful, the staff here likes to help people and they are very friendly!

name: Grace Williams
text: GREAT Place n UNDERSTANDING

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Grace! We are happy you have had a great experience with our team.

name: Shan Swindell
text: Best bank ever

name: Rachel LeNae
text: They offer free coffee in the lobby, but were extremely rude when my friend fixed a cup before getting in line.

name: william feggins
text: Brian, Erica, and Billy in the Mortgage Department are the absolute best! They have excellent customer service and treat people like family! I love Avadian Credit Union and I'm excited to start banking with them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the five star review and the kind words! We are delighted to have you as a members!

name: Lynnette Romback
text:
I went in to make my initial deposit to my account and they two ladies were so nice , helpful , friendly .... and when opening my
Account online I’ve spoken to Kassie Glover for everything , nothing but exceptional customer service thus far !

resp.text: Thank you for the 5* review! We are delighted to have you as a member!

name: Kim Dillon
text: No communication til week of construction loan due date, then said was due even though had had 1 extension prior & city permits were out of our control.  Also, if you need your online password reset or any other customer service over the weekend, they’re closed so forget it. Their equity line checks are exactly like their regular checking checks, so be very careful to differentiate. Their staff is very nice and helpful, though.

resp.text: Kim we are sorry you have had a bad experience with us. We do have three branches that are open on weekends and a 24 hour help line. We appreciate your feedback and will work to provide a better experience in these areas.

name: Jeremy Patton
text: Excellent experience with them.  I love the banking side.  I also have done a mortgage loan through them at an excellent rate and customer service.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the stellar review! We are delighted to count you as an Avadian member!

name: Will Payne
text: We have only been banking with Avadian for a few months, but we have been very impressed with their service and products. Never a long wait at the drive thru or inside at the teller. Accounts were quick and easy to open. Fair rates and fees. Staff are all very nice and know you by name. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Will! We are delighted you decided to join us. Have a fantastic weekend!

name: Ivonne Campbell
text: I am a customer of Avadian and I love banking with them.  They provide amazing customer service.  When I come in, everyone greets me by name and I know their names too.  When the branch transitioned from American Bank of Huntsville to Avadian , I must admit things took a little time to get re-aligned.  After the transition it has been smooth sailing.  They offered me an amazing interest rate on my car loan and made it a super convenient buying experience.  You receive your debit card on the spot and they are compatible with Apple Pay.

name: Chris Clark
text: I walked in today to do a deposit and was very rudely confronted by a male employee saying I am required to wear a mask "in his branch." I will be moving my business to another financial institution and closing my accounts ASAP.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience. We aren’t requiring masks in our branch but they are encouraged for the safety of our staff and our members. We will speak with the branch staff regarding this.

name: DeAnne Daniels
text: I love banking with Avadian. They are all about customer service. I moved here from Birmingham and followed Avadian all the way. Have been a loyal customer for 8+ years. Checking,  savings, everything I need.

resp.text: Thank you for the review DeAnne!!

name: Carrie Hall
text: We have been trying to get a replacement card for my husband for over three weeks.  We both live in the same home and I have already had a replacement done on mine and it was sent to the correct address and now they sent my husbands card to an old address.  Which keep in mind we have a joint account which would have the same address. Bit yet they made a mistake and sent it some where else trying to say his address was never changed which is a lie. If we lose money over this they will pay what is stolen.!!!!

name: lWhite_Foxl
text: Very nice friendly staff.

name: Lit Kit10
text: Love this bank. I’ve been using it for years and they never fail to over achieve. I’ve had issues with the company before, but everyone from this branch is perfect and the 24 hour service they offer is a dream with the hours I work. Will continue to do business with this bank based solely off of this branch.

name: Jeffrey Akers
text: This branch has been sold to PeoplesSouth Bank.  PeoplesSouth has opened a branch in this location as of April 2020.  Come by and see us!

name: Trucking Inside
text: Great people. Been banking here for 10 years

name: Kelli Brannon
text: Always polite and eager to help!! Greeted as soon as you walk in the door!!!

name: JA me ReVs
text: Closed.shut down.sad

name: Retarded Potato
text: Love banking with them. My only complaint is I get off work at 4pm. I can never make it there to do any business unless I ask to leave early at work. Don't see why they can't stay open just 30 mins longer 🤷.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We will pass along the recommendation!

name: coreyseth88
text: Drive thru always takes forever

name: Jessica D
text: I love my Tyndall! Everyone knows me there and greets me by name every single time I walk in, asks how my business is going, and overall makes me feel welcome and valued. I've gotten two mortgages through Tyndall and honestly would recommend Debbie Beasock to anyone for above and beyond wonderful service, not to mention the great rates and all the money saved on lending fees! I do all my banking through Tyndall for the ease of it all but also because I truly appreciate the associates at my local branch. Great service goes a long way!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words, Jessica! We truly appreciate your membership, and we're happy to hear about your good experience working with Debbie on your mortgage.

name: Nanoir 2688
text: My only complaint would be is that Atm stays down alot.

resp.text: Hi, Thank you for leaving us a 3-Star review. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the ATMs. We are in the process of completing construction of 2 new branch locations. This has caused the temporary outages with relocating the ATMS. This will be resolved as we’re wrapping construction up over the next month or so. Thank you for your patience and for being a loyal member!

name: M Stevens
text: Went here with my son to get the title to a new vehicle he purchased. I waited outside while he went in with members to pay off their loan and get the title to his new vehicle he had purchased from credit bureau members who were only wanting the payoff in exchange for sale of their Honda Odyssey van. The whole process took less than 20 minutes, I was surprised after reading reviews of TFC being slow. That was not the case for us.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and Congrats to your son on his new vehicle purchase! We're happy that your experience was excellent as we're striving to speed the processes up in order to create better member experiences.

name: Joel Bullock
text: Never had a problem with Tyndall Fed Credit Union and have used a few others during my life time. They are always willing take care of any banking needs that i may have from making deposits to making a loan. Their friendly staff makes it a pleasure to do business with. I highly recommend them to everyone who would only want the best in the banking business.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Joel. We love doing business with you, as well. Thank you for your membership.

name: Naima Phillips (miamixmade)
text: The teller that I had was very pleasant and nice. She worked quick to get my transaction completed and thanked me for putting my account number on the back of my check. Thank you for your great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Naima! We appreciate your membership!

name: Taronjela Reeves
text: The lines are so slow you call genie and it says incorrect member number and I have my membership card in my hand and incorrect pin which I had it for years that’s the number which you give them the 4 digit pin so they know who you are birthday etc. and it says can’t be found , what a joke and also you call and leave call back number they never return your call then the online banking always lock you out run 🏃‍♀️ as fast as you can they will rob you

resp.text:
Hi, we apologize for the inconveniences you experienced when using Online Banking and Genie24. Our systems were offline due to regular scheduled maintenance until 6:00AM (CST) this morning. In the future if experiencing these types of issues, please check tyndall.org and you can see a notification on the website of regular schedule system maintenance windows.  We hope that you’ll consider amending your review, and again, thank you for your membership, and patience as we completed our regular scheduled maintenance. Have a Blessed 2021!

Sincerely,

Tyndall Federal Credit Union

name: Roman Harrell
text: This branch is awesome. The bank employees here are very friendly and helpful. I believe Tyndall is one of the best credit unions out there. You can’t beat the low rates and additional features they have with their loans. Thanks to everyone at TFCU!

resp.text: Thank you for your great feedback, Roman! We're so happy you're a member with us, and we love seeing you at our branch!

name: tim jeter
text: Very nice

resp.text: Thank you, Tim! We appreciate your membership!

name: Jessie Holmes
text: I’ve been banking with Tyndall about a year now and I have no complaints. I love the small town, customer service feel when I go in. Everyone greets me and treats me very kindly. Jason is sweet as can be, it’s nice to have such a friendly bank in a larger city where customer service is tends to fall short at other places.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Jessie! We truly value your membership and appreciate the feedback regarding our staff.

name: cody mack
text: If I could rate 0 stars I would. My money was stolen directly from my account and have talked to them and they still after 3 months have not contacted me and are treating it like a game. Issue was resolved after a few months but took forever, I appreciate it being handled but it wasn't in a timely manner and I don't know how my money was stolen, so I still don't trust you guys with my money. 2 stars.

resp.text: Hi, Cody! We have discussed this with our branch manager, and it seems that this has been resolved. Please let us know if you would like for someone to give you a call to discuss the situation. Thank you!

name: Karina Sanford
text: We have banked with Tyndall for many years. Staff always try to be helpful and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Karina! We love seeing you in the branch!

name: L Welch
text: Been a member since I was a teenager. I was displaced due to Hurricane Michael and behold $50 was deposited into my savings account by Tyndall. I have nothing but outstanding services over the years. Your the best! 😊😊😊😊😊😊😀

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Lorenz. We are very sorry to hear that you were displaced but are happy that the $50 helped. Thanks for your membership!

name: J McClain
text:
Nelly is great to do business with! Very knowledgeable!
Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words about our staff! Thank you for your membership!

name: Art of Zink
text:
I have been with this credit union happily for six years, but I believe I no longer will be after what has happened tonight.
I was waiting on my check to clear today so that I could get a ride home from the convention that I am currently working at in Columbus, Ohio. My check cleared, but Tyndall Federal Credit Union's system decided to automatically withhold every last dime from my pay check. Not only do I not have access to any of my funds, I couldn't even get a ride back to my hotel, and I'm stranded in the middle of a city that I'm unfamiliar with. After calling every number I could think of (and even frantically trying to contact them on Facebook messenger), The only option I had was to call local police dispatch to get a ride back to my hotel so that I didn't have to walk back through a dangerous part of town.
The fact that you don't have an after hours emergency service number has literally put me in a very dangerous situation. it's a shame, but I don't believe I will be banking with you any longer.

resp.text: Leah, we are very sorry to hear about your experience, and we hope that our Member Services Department was able to clear everything up when you spoke this week. We truly value your membership.

name: Jonathan Gray
text: Great experience every time I am in there. Love the friendly service and great attitudes everyone has. The ladies at the Dothan branch really gives personal service to all customers. Special shout out to Tequila and Shasta.

name: Michael Nowell
text: Very friendly and fast and service.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Nowell! We are so glad you stopped by!

name: Jonathan Courtney
text: I worked with Mrs. Debbie Beasock and the staff at Tyndall a couple months ago when i purchased my first home and was more than pleased. Very nice people that will do all they can to help you out. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind review, Jonathan! We are happy to have you as a member.

name: Ronald Summers
text: Always friendly. Sometimes slow but that's due to the customers in front of me, not the tellers. I always have a great experience dealing with them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Mr. Summers, we value you as our member and are always here to serve!

name: Toni Bloom
text: Customer service is great the staff always kind and professional

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Toni! We are very happy to have you as a member.

name: Charlie Dykes
text: Tyndall in general is a difficult branch. I had to have a perfect credit score before they would lend me money. Hey advertise a lot but are extremely selective only lending to people with high credit score. Essentially they help those that can be helped anywhere. Not the hometown bank they advertise to be. This particular branch has been the most difficult to work with. I will be changing banks because my time is too valuable to spend being talked to to by a teller.

name: Jeramie Burleson
text: They treat me like royalty every time I walk in. I love this place!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Jeramie, we truly value your membership and thank you for being a Tyndall member!

name: Paige Vinson
text: I would give zero but I don't think that's an option. They froze a young newly widowed mother's account with no notice... on Christmas Eve. Yep. It was a joint account but, for whatever insensitive, heartless reason, that's what they did.

name: Hayden Vick
text: They take WAY too long. Love banking with tyndall but this location is never quick.  Even when they are not busy.

resp.text: We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and have addressed your concern. We truly value your membership and feedback!

name: Big Mommam
text: Excellent credit union!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Sandlot Dothan
text: Got to be the worst customer service I have ever seen in any business.

resp.text: Hello, Jeremey. We are so sorry to hear that you had a negative experience. We would love to talk with you about this, if you'll give us a call at 850-769-9999.

name: Andrea Kelley
text: Always friendly service!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Andrea! We appreciate your membership!

name: Marc Dempsey
text: It would help if they had a eastside branch

resp.text: Thank you for your review Marc, Have a Great Weekend!

name: Jon Holzman
text: Terrible customer service. I see no reason to trust them with an account.

name: clayton kleinschnitz
text: Honestly pretty awful service. You have to jump through so many hoops and many of their services are handled by a third party. Very aggravating

name: John Smithy
text: Read the fine print and ask questions. Despite having almost 0 debt and a very good credit score for a mortgage loan. I had to be trapped into a government loan that: will never cancel PMI even after the state agreed 25% has been paid off on the loan, I only could be approved to this government loan program based on an Assumption of what my yearly earnings would be, and to get out of the program I will have to redo the whole process. Once I am financially able to I will be getting out of it and never using your bank ever again for anything.

name: Jessica
text: We have our mortgage through bancorpsouth. When we decided to open a line of credit with the equity in our home, Mabinty worked with us & she could not have been more efficient or more courteous. She made the process incredibly easy, convenient & fast, & explained everything in a concise manner. Seriously, I cannot overstate how amazing she was. Happy to do business with a company who has such nice employees.

name: Ruby Ngururu
text:
Very friendly n Helpful Staff.  Mrs.Jamie Horsley was very helpful n assisting me with opening up my Personal n Business Account.

Thanks Mrs Horsely

name: Dixie Godette
text: I am absolutely horrified! This is the worst bank in existence. They trick you with their good customer service then charge fees laterally on top of fees. I called yesterday upset about a fee, that they charged after the balance had been brought to positive. And they added a other paid item fee because I was upset about the first one. I've never witnessed a bank treat their customers this way. They stay open by making the poor poorer! Do not bank here!

name: James Davis
text: Got nice friendly staff polite one thing wrong they don't open till 9 in the morning and they close at 5 p.m. that's when everyone is getting off of work at 5 and like I said I'm closing my account out I'm going to move it to metrobank they open at 7:30 a m stay open till 6:30 p.m. ask my type of banking I don't have to rush rush rush through traffic thank you for your business I'm moving my account this morning

name: Jason Thomas
text: Wonderful bank. Friendly staff that goes out of their way to make sure their customers are happy.

name: Matthew Slaughter
text: Leenise and her team always go the extra mile to make sure that the provide excellent service!

name: peggy siragusa
text: Great people always there when you need them

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Great people love this bank

name: Drayke Parris
text: Always great service from friendly staff

name: Lesley Archer
text: I love the small locally-owned family atmosphere of this bank. Every time I have had to call them or stop by with any kind of issue it has been resolved with minimal hassle. The ladies that work behind the counter are so friendly and funny. But everyone that works there has been very easy to deal with. I love my bank.

resp.text: Thank you Lesley!

name: Wales Carter
text: They have really nice people working there and really quick service.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Art Of Valor
text: Tellers are very friendly and helpful. Great place to bank for personal and business purposes.

resp.text: Thanks J!

name: Margie Strong
text: Always great. Know who you are. Small town bank

name: Daniel Miller
text: Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you Daniel!

name: Dewayne Kiker
text: Good bank and good people!

resp.text: Thank you Dewayne!

text: Friendly staff, but it is SLOW!! Not to mention, the never seem to answer the phone. You can be waiting up to 1-2 hours just to be able to talk with a banker. I have been forced to close all of my personal and business accounts because I don’t have time to wait for them to finish personal conversations with each other. Regions, here I come!!

name: l Thomas
text: This is a nice and friendly bank. But its one of the slowest banks in the world! It doest matter if its one person a head of you, its still gonna take forever & a day! Then they normally have one teller I just wish they do better on the time

name: Timothy Abney
text: Great service

name: Hayden H
text: I've banked with BB&T for 3 years now and I've never had a problem. They have a lot more local branches compared to banks like Regions and Wells Fargo so you don't have to drive a half hour away to cash a check.

name: Melanie Fuller

name: John Ward

name: Kaitlin Conner
text: Terrible branch. I will be closing my account and I will never use this bank again and I will advise against this bank every chance I get. Disrespectful people. I have never been so disgusted with a bank in my life. If you are thinking about opening an account here think twice. I'm sure you can find a more respectable bank to go to.

name: Raymond Ryder
text: Nice employees

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Good branch

name: Jeff Olson
text: Kristen Strickland at Bank Independent is the only person you need to get your Business financing! She is extremely sharp,  incredibly detailed and will spend the time to analyze and meet your business needs with no stone left unturned. She makes sure you get the best service and product you need.

resp.text: Jeff, Kristen and our team at Bank Independent appreciate your generous recommendation.  Thank you for trusting us with your business financing needs.  We look forward to continuing to serve you.

name: Dustin Mathias
text: We had an issue arise at one time, but Bank Independent made it right. A service that will work with you to solve an issue gets five starts from me.

resp.text: Hi Dustin, we're sorry you had a bad experience! We want to learn more so we can do better next time. Please email ma@bibank.com to let us know what happened.

name: Will Payne
text:
I have only been banking with Bank Independent for a short period of time. So far, they've been wonderful. Great mobile app, remote deposit from my office, friendly staff and sales personnel.

Deposits are available next business day.  My vendors and employees do not get charged to cash a check drawn on BI Bank.

Sales officers have come to my office twice to help get us set up with merchant services, line of credit, and remote deposit.

Great rates, friendly service, and a personalized touch.  It's nice to be able to speak face to face with the people that operate the bank.

Highly recommend these guys.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Will! We are proud to have the opportunity to serve the financial needs of your business.

name: Brooklyn Tyler
text: I have never had to wait so long this bank is horrible

resp.text: We are so sorry you have had a negative experience at our Huntsville location. We want to learn more about what happened and resolve the issue if possible. Would you be willing to email our team at ma@bibank.com with details so we can follow up? Thank you!

name: Sherry Alexander
text: Friendly, helpful experience....so glad there is a branch in Huntsville!  Looking forward to the new 72/Nance Rd branch opening Spring 2018.

name: Mitchell Monica
text: Racial  experience first time ever. Going to report  to the news as well.

resp.text: Hi Kalandra--First of all, let me apologize for the delay in responding to your review. No excuse, but we did not receive notification of your post. Secondly, and most importantly, I am so sorry that you had a bad experience in our office, and we would very much like to speak with you about it. Would you mind emailing us at social@bibank.com and providing a number where we could reach you? Thank you so much.

name: Kathleen Christian
text: From the first moment I walked in her office door, Donna Lowery and her assistant made me feel welcome and special. They are both so personable  and warm. Donna took a lot of care as she walked me through the application and loan process, making sure I understood all the steps thoroughly. She was always available and by the time we were ready to close, she was not only my contact with the mortgage company, she was my friend. I have no hesitation in recommending Donna Lowery and in saying that you just can’t go wrong in choosing her to help you with your mortgage needs.

name: Halee Williams
text: Working with Donna for the past 6 months or so has been so wonderful.  She's easy going, easy to talk with, knowledgeable, and dependable.  Any time we have a client working with her, we know everything on Donna's side will be handled without us having to ask.  She works in a timely manner and always beats us to the punch.  We refer her out to most of our clients, knowing that she'll put anyone she works with at the top of her priority list, and knowing that she'll make sure they have everything they need throughout the entire closing process.  Donna is one of the best loan officers out there.

name: Amanda Harper
text: Donna was fantastic when I was purchasing my first home. I had so many questions and she was always there to help. She made the first process so smooth and such a pleasant experience that I reached out to her for our next purchase. She was amazing in helping my husband and I get into our first home together. There were several hurdles and she walked us through each step of the way. Not to mention I was pregnant with twins and we were really pushed for time. Donna went above and beyond to be sure we got into our home before the girl’s were born and I had plenty of time to nest. I highly recommend her and her team. They are beyond helpful and I will always call on her the next time we’re ready to move.

name: Constance Cooper
text: Donna was amazing! We were buying our second home and had a mortgage company already lined up, but I found out about Donna through a family friend and decided to see the rate she could get me. She was very competitive and was honest upfront about everything. She took care of us and made buying our home a breeze! I would highly recommend her and her team!!!

name: Amber Pruitt
text: Donna and her team are amazing!! My husband and I have worked with Donna on loans for two houses and each time was perfect! Donna can answer any question and always responds quickly. She even came to my house for me to sign papers after I had had surgery! 100% recommend Donna and her team!

name: Kristins YouTube
text: Donna is awesome.  I have never met someone so knowledgeable about mortgages and she really seems to love what she does. She makes herself available to you for any and all questions and is happy to do it. I would highly recommend her.

name: Jayron Grant
text: Donna Lowery and her team are excellent! Being a real estate agent, I depend on Donna often for mortgage related questions. She is always quick to respond and goes above and beyond to help get buyers where they need to be to purchase a home. I highly recommend Donna Lowery to anyone needing financing for their home buying needs! She is very polite and very knowledgeable!!!

name: Amariah Edwards
text: Loved working with Donna and her team. She is very honest and keeps her word on everything. I was introduced to her about a year on my first time home buying process and everything was professional and in order. Even though the sellers back out at the last minute, Donna still kept us informed of other options. On, this second time around, I wouldn't want to go to anyone else.

name: leslie hudgens
text: Donna did a great job working with my family to get our credit under control so we could purchase our first home! Very kind lady, you can tell she really cares about her clients. We had a really great experience.

name: Betheney Holt
text: SHE IS TRULY THE BEST LENDER IN THE BIRMINGHAM  AND SURROUNDING AREAS. IF YOU WANT A PERSONABLE RELATIONSHIP WITH YOUR LENDER WITH OVER 25 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN THE MORTGAGE INDUSTRY THEN YOU DEFIANTLY WANT TO MAKE SURE YOU TAKE THE TIME AND GIVE HER A CALL. HER TEAM ENSURES QUICK EASY CLOSINGS AND WORK HARD TO GET THEIR CUSTOMERS TO THE FINISH LINE.

name: Jan Jones
text:
Donna Lowery and her team does a great job! Donna can answer any question and goes over/above....
if you have a mortgage need give Bank of England - Donna Lowery Team a try they will not disappoint. They are awesome!!

name: Ricky Albritton
text: I have never met or worked with a more professional lady than Donna. She showed me that she cares about me and all of her clients. I’ve had many mortgages, but never any better service that what she and Her  team provides. She alone will do my future mortgages.

name: Leighann Aloia
text: I highly recommend Donna to help with a new mortgage or refinancing your home. She is very professional with quick turn around response. Very easy to work with!! You will not be disappointed!

name: Diane Harris
text: Meeting Ms. Lowery was a great experience, she went out of her way to help me in attaing my loan, she met me at my office when to sign papers when I could not leave. She went to the court house to get a copy of a document for me, she really went the last mile. She is a truly a remarkable Godly sent person someone you can't forget. I will use her again in the future for any refinances ,etc.

name: jonnycates
text: There are a lot of GOOD lenders, but even more BAD lenders, and then there is Donna Lowery!!! Donna and her team at BOE Mortgage, goes above and beyond to get home loans approved. She has continuously made loans work that no other lender has been able to fund and has saved many deals for many of my clients!! I have personally used Donna for my personal home loan because of the great rates she offers and the willingness to go the extra mile. DO NOT hesitate to give Donna at BOE mortgage a call for all your home loan and refinancing needs!!!

name: Josh Fuller
text: Fabulous is the simplest way to put into words my experience working with Donna and her team (Betheney). If you do not think you can get financed, call Miss Donna. text: My husband and I started looking at homes in the area about a year ago and a sales person from DR Horton referred us to Dean at Sunset Mortgage. It was a nice change from what we had been hearing. Things like “oh yeah, we can get you into a house” and then going through all of the craziness and then being denied. Dean gave us good, honest advice and told us exactly what we needed to do. We followed everything he said to a T and here we are! In August we closed on our brand new dream home! I’m positive we wouldn’t have been able to do it without his help. Him and Jenny were an absolute joy to work with. They made every aspect as easy and stress free as possible. If we ever buy again, we will definitely be back at Sunset Mortgage!

We were stressed at the thought of buying a home and honestly, I'd rather buy a house again than buy a car - that's how SEAMLESS and STRESS FREE it was to use Sunset Mortgage. name: Ronald Gorham
text: My Wife and I live in New York and were trying to buy a home for retirement in Alabama. This can be a very challenging task without the help of knowledgeable finance and real estate professionals. Fortunately for us we had Envoy Mortgage recommended to us by our real estate agent. We worked with Michael Walden through the whole process and he was always quick to respond to any questions we had, which were more than a few. As soon as we applied online we got a phone call response and were pre-approved within a couple of days. This made our home hunt much easier and less stressful. We were given good advice as to the best route to take and were communicated with on almost a daily basis. We did most of the mortgage process electronically and the final paper work by overnight mail. With the timely and concise instructions on what was expected of us and how to get it done the process went very smoothly and we are now happy home owners in Alabama. We appreciate the invaluable assistance we received and highly recommend Envoy Mortgage and especially Michael Walden.

name: Shane McClain
text: Ann over at Envoy was absolutely amazing to work with. She kept us informed the entire process and worked hard to get us approved. Was an absolute pleasure to work with and we will definitely use her again in the future for our next property.

name: Stacey S
text: Michael was awesome. Thank you so much for keeping me informed throughout my home buying process. I will recommend you to future home buyers any day.

name: Tuti Tutti
text: Excellent customer service. Made buying a house from out of state easier. I was pre approved from both my bank and Envoy and I went with Envoy for various reasons; one was that it was significantly less money to buy down my points, they  also made qualifying easier and they had excellent communication skills. They answered all my questions in a timely manner and took me through the process without me having to search for extra sources. And you can get a mortgage with them in any part of the state of Alabama, not just Enterprise. I'm very grateful for all of the hard work Beth put into making this happen. I highly recommend Envoy Mortgage.

name: Tyler Smith
text: Very professional and easy process. My wife and I couldn’t have been any happier with the professionalism from Envoy Mortgage company. Michael made every step and process so easy and was willing to help or explain with any concerns or questions we had. Highly recommend this company to anyone looking to purchase or build a home. Thanks again!

name: christina lilly
text: This company is great to work with! Ann was our lender and made the process as stress free as buying a home can be. You talk to a person who is local in the area you are buying in, not someone across the country who doesn’t care if you are approved or not. Highly recommend this company to anyone who looking for a mortgage.

name: Nicholas O'Hare
text: Ann was great to work with and explained every step of the home buying process as we purchased or first house.  She fast-tracked us to closing and offered us the best rate of any lender we shopped for.  I strongly recommend Ann and Envoy, and will be looking to them in the future for my real estate purchasing needs.

name: bebe horst
text: This was the smoothest experience we've ever had in buying a house. Micheal Walden stayed with us every step of the way.  I cannot express enough good things to say about his working with us. Thankyou again for the promptness that you accomplished with getting us into our new home.

name: Russell Dyess
text: We had a great refinance experience with Michael at Envoy Mortgage in Enterprise. We shopped around for the best rate both locally and on the internet. The internet companies promised great interest rates, demanded a lot of information, took a week, then raised the rate. Envoy offered a great rate and never changed it. The process was quick and when we had questions, I would email Michael, and we would have an answer usually by the next day. We highly recommend Michael at Envoy Mortgage in Enterprise to anyone looking for a mortgage refinance.

name: Ron Hendrickson
text: My wife and I had contacted a real estate agent in Chipley, FL, Casey, to view a home that we were interested in.  After touring the property, we made an offer for Casey to present to the sellers.  As we were leaving, Casey asked if I had already gotten pre-approval status from a lender, and I said no, that I was going to contact Quicken Loans, whom I had some history with, for the mortgage.  Casey recommended Michael at Envoy Mortgage stating she had numerous clients that had worked with Michael and were very pleased.  Based on that recommendation, I went with Envoy and I was extremely pleased with how everything worked out.  Michael was with me and Sandi every step of the way.  He kept us appraised of every step during the process, and by and large, the whole applying process and follow up documents that had to be filled out and signed, was far more simple than I imagined it would be.  Michael is a true professional in every since of the word.  I was skeptical at first, having gone down the mortgage lending road before, but I have to say, Michael made the journey very easy.  Thanks again, Michael.  Great job!

name: Chris Elam
text: Michael at Envoy Mortgage is fantastic. He helped us out last year with our first home loan, and his level of communication is out of this world. Michael answered all my questions no matter what time of day or night it was, and even on the weekends. You don’t get that type of customer service from everyone else. I recently turned back to Michael for an Interest rate reduction refinance loan and he was able to lower my interest rate by almost 2 points with no buy down. Thank you Michael everything you’ve done for my and my family. I couldn’t be any happier. I can’t stress this enough, if you’re looking to buy a house or refinance your mortgage, give Michael at Envoy Mortgage a call. We will continue to refer others to Michael.

name: Jay Hall
text: My wife and I came from a "big" bank - in fact one we had been with for over 40 years - one she had actually worked for - for nearly 20 years. Natalie Norton and her excellent group of ladies just make us feel SO welcome EVERY time we go. They know us by name and go out of their way to greet us with smiles and serve us so splendidly. We wouldn't dream of going elsewhere for banking services. We are spoiled !!!!

resp.text: We are so glad that you love Bryant Bank and have experienced our unbeatable customer service.  Natalie and the team in Trussville are wonderful.  If we can ever do anything for you and your wife, please let us know!
